description.hltext_display: Hon sjunger i Timrå i morgon
description.content:
Hallå där, Kristina Elfversson, sopran som ger julkonsert med Timrå manskör och Marcus Häggström i Timrå i morgon kväll. Har du sjungit tillsammans med en manskör förut?
– Nej, aldrig, och det ska bli väldigt kul. Vi ska sjunga "O helga natt" och det ska bli häftigt att solisten är sopran och kören är en manskör.
Vem är du?
– Jag är sångerska, född i Söderhamn och utbildad bland annat på Kapellsberg i Härnösand. Jag har gått Operahögskolan i Göteborg och tog examen i våras. Just nu bor jag i Berlin, tar lektioner, gör auditions och försöker prova på en sångarkarriär.
Har du gett konserter i Sundsvall och Timrå tidigare?
– Ja, jag har sjungit flera gånger i Granlo kyrka och även i Selånger. Det är mest i kyrkorna som jag har uppträtt. Nu sjunger jag i Timrå kyrka med manskören på torsdagen, i Granlo kyrka sent på torsdag kväll och i Granloholms kyrka under julnattsmässan.
– Jag har också min syster i Sundsvall. Och vänner.
Vad ska du sjunga under de tre konserterna?
– Sånger som Marias vaggsång, O helga natt, Himlen i min famn och Mozarts Exsultate jubilate.
Varför har du slagit dig ner i Berlin?
– Jag har redan bott i Italien ett tag, lärt mig italienska och provat på hur det är där. Nu tyckte jag att jag ville lära mig tyska och ta sånglektioner här. Kulturlivet här är stort och det känns redan väldigt bra.
Det är ju ganska vanligt att svenska sångare går på export till Tyskland?
– Ja, och jag tänkte bli en av dem. I alla fall i början; jag har ingen familj än och då går det ju bra att bo här. Men så småningom tror jag att jag kommer tillbaka till Sverige.
Har du hunnit få några roller?
– Just nu övar jag bara in en repertoar inför auditions och agentuppsjungningar. De första auditions är i slutet av januari, så jag åker tillbaka direkt efter nyår.

description.hltext_display: Prep roundup: Fifth-ranked Madison boys rout Harrisburg 87-42
description.content:
Michael Sullivan and Taylor Bloom each scored 18 points as fifth-ranked Class A Madison routed Harrisburg 87-42 in boys basketball action Tuesday night in Madison.
Mitch Benson and Logan Wray each added 12 for the Bulldogs (2-1), who led 44-22 at halftime and 73-34 entering the fourth quarter.
Andrew McCuen scored seven points for Harrisburg (0-4).
Madison faces No. 7 Chester at the Entringer Classic on Dec. 31 at 6:45 p.m.
PIERRE 57, HURON 48 in Pierre - Lane Severyn scored 17 points and Zach Hanson added 16 as the Governors pulled away in the fourth quarter to win.
Severyn hit three 3-pointers for Pierre, which trailed 37-35 after three quarters but outscored the Tigers 22-11 in the final period.
For Huron, Luke Carr scored 14 points and Adam Zwanziger added 12.
GARRETSON 64, DELL RAPIDS ST. MARY 35 in Dell Rapids - Chad Stoterau had 16 points and eight rebounds and Sawyer Gibson added 14 points for the Blue Dragons (3-1). For St. Mary (0-5), Cody Gannon scored 10.
Baltic 55, Colman-Egan 42 in Baltic - Steven Weber scored 15 points and Chris Mesa had 11 points with 10 rebounds for Baltic. Josiah Aberson had 11 points. For Colman-Egan (2-2), Nick Sweeney scored 13 points and Cory Haugen scored 12. Up next: Baltic (4-0) hosts Sioux Valley on Jan. 3.
Mitchell 57, Yankton 39 in Mitchell - Tucker Volesky scored 19 points on 7-for-13 shooting to lead the second-ranked Kernels (5-0). Jade Miller had 11 points and six rebounds. For Yankton (1-4), Cole Drodtzmann had eight points and Dylan Tacke and Cody Ulmer both had seven.
The Bucks shot 36 percent from the field compared to Yankton's 56 percent.
Castlewood 61, Elkton-Lake Benton 50 in Elkton - Trevor Sikkink scored 29 points with eight rebounds, three steals and five assists to lead Castlewood (3-1). Jordan Feyerisen had 16 points and eight rebounds.
For E-LB (0-4), John Weise scored 15 points, while Jon Barthel, Brad Tingle and Tyler Schindler all had eight points.
Hitchcock-Tulare 72, Ipswich 35 in Ipswich - Joey Mitchell scored 18 points to lead Class B No. 1 Hitchcock-Tulare. Lane Meyer had 14 points for Ipswich (0-4).

description.hltext_display: Chinezen willen hegemonie Windows doorbreken
description.content:
Gepubliceerd: Dinsdag 21 december 2010 Auteur: Uhro van der Pluijm
Twee Chinese OS-makers slaan de handen ineen om een nieuw besturingssysteem op basis van FreeBSD te maken. Dit besturingssysteem zou een binnenlands alternatief voor Windows moeten worden. Twee Chinese producenten van besturingssystemen bundelen hun krachten om een nieuw desktopbesturingssysteem op basis van FreeBSD te maken. Het besturingssysteem, dat NeoKylin gedoopt wordt, gaat zich in eerste instantie richten op het bedrijfsleven en defensie.
Veilig binnenlands alternatief
China Standard Software en de Nationale Universiteit van Defensietechnlogie gaan vooral samenwerken om de weg te effenen voor een krachtiger binnenlands besturingssysteem. Het eerste bedrijf maakt momenteel NeoShine Linux voor de overheid, het zakenleven en persoonlijke computers.
De universiteit maakt KylinOS, dat een ‘veilig alternatief’ voor buitenlandse software als Windows is. Ook NeoKylin moet een veilig binnenlands alternatief voor Windows worden.
Het marktaandeel van deze Chinese besturingssystemen groeit momenteel op overheidscomputers, maar particulieren blijven vasthouden aan Windows. Dat besturingsysteem heeft in China erg te kampen met piraterij. Ruim de helft van de Windowsinstallaties in China zou illegaal zijn.
Lokale economie steunen
Veel binnenlandse besturingssystemen lijden onder hetzelfde probleem. De meeste producenten geven hun systeem daarom gratis weg, waardoor zij weinig inkomsten hebben. Toch blijft de Chinese overheid inzetten op binnenlandse besturingssystemen. Zij doen dat om veiligheidsredenen en om de lokale economie te steunen.
Analist Matthew Cheung van Gartner stelt dat veel Chinese softwaremakers zich daarom op de overheid en het bedrijfsleven richten. Het lijkt er namelijk op dat er aan particulieren weinig geld te verdienen valt. Wanneer het nieuwe OS uitkomt en of de bedrijven zich ook op het buitenland gaan richten is onbekend.

description.hltext_display: Ministerie mag SAP voortrekken in aanbesteding
description.content:
Gepubliceerd: Dinsdag 21 december 2010 Auteur: René Schoemaker
Oracle heeft een rechtszaak verloren waarin het protesteerde tegen de voorkeur voor SAP als leverancier van een financieel systeem voor enkele ministeries. De rechter vond de aanbesteding rechtmatig. Oracle bezint zich op eventuele vervolgstappen, zo laat het bedrijf in een verklaring weten. De softwarereus is woedend omdat het ministerie van Financiën in de aanbesteding voor een gezamenlijk financieel systeem voor meerdere ministeries expliciet vroeg naar levering, onderhoud en support van 765 SAP-licenties. Daarmee vond Oracle dat zij al bij voorbaat werd uitgesloten van mededinging in de aanbesteding.
De ministeries van Sociale Zaken, Volksgezondheid en Financiën willen samen een gezamenlijke organisatie opzetten voor de financiële administratie. Daartoe zou verder moeten worden gebouwd op het bestaande SAP-systeem van Sociale Zaken. De Europese aanbesteding van het project, dat door de ministeries ‘3F’ is genoemd, ging uit van die doelstelling.
Vervang SAP complex en kostbaar
In de aanbestedingsformulieren wordt de keuze voor hergebruik van het bestaande SAP-systeem gemotiveerd met een verwijzing naar ‘vervangingsvraagstukken op automatiseringsgebied’ die dermate complex en kostbaar zijn dat deze voor relatief kleine(re) ministeries zelfstandig niet tot een goed einde te brengen zijn, zo valt te lezen op de website van Binnenlands Bestuur.
De aanbesteding is van de zomer gedaan en Oracle maakte daarop direct bezwaar. Het bedrijf stapte vervolgens naar de rechter. “Op de markt voor grote bedrijfssoftwaresystemen is slechts een beperkt aantal leveranciers aanwezig”, zo motiveert Oracle in een uitgegeven verklaring. “De adresseerbare markt binnen de overheid is voor deze leveranciers zeer beperkt.”
Geen mededinging
“Zoals de aanbesteding voor 3F nu is opgezet, betekent dit, dat zonder enige vorm van mededinging, twee (Financiën en Volksgezondheid, red) van de elf ministeries aan een voorkeursleverancier wordt toegekend en dat op deze manier voor andere leveranciers een substantieel deel van de potentiële markt wegvalt. Het aanbestedingsrecht heeft als doel een open marktwerking te creëren met gelijke kansen voor alle inschrijvers”, voert Oracle verder aan.
De rechter heeft de bezwaren van Oracle dus niet gevolgd en de aanbesteding als rechtmatig beoordeeld. Onduidelijk is nog welke motivatie daaraan ten grondslag ligt. Zowel Oracle als het ministerie kon daar op dit moment niets over zeggen.
Vendor lock-in
Oracle zegt wel dat de uitspraak softwareleveranciers de mogelijkheid geeft hun softwareportfolio op dezelfde wijze uit te breiden bij bestaande overheidsklanten. Dat houdt wel in dat ministeries via die gedachte kiezen voor een vrijwillige ‘vendor lock-in’. Indien andere departementen de werkwijze volgen van de drie genoemde ministeries lijkt Oracle wat betreft financiële systemen geen rol meer te spelen.
De gunning van de opdracht zou dit najaar zijn, maar werd door de rechtszaak uitgesteld. De waarde van de raamovereenkomst, die drie jaar moet lopen, is geraamd op 3 miljoen euro.

description.hltext_display: El Corte Inglés inaugura una planta de lujo
Black Jack completes railhead operations
description.content:
1st Cavalry Division public affairs
With a scheduled rotation to the Joint Readiness Training Center in Fort Polk, La., approaching soon, the time for movement operations is now.
Troopers with 2nd Brigade Combat Team, 1st Cavalry Division, executed rail operations Dec. 10 to 14.
It was a joint effort as soldiers from across the brigade assembled with members of the Directorate of Logistics, Fort Hood, and a private contractor to successfully help prepare brigade vehicles for movement to Joint Readiness Training Center, Dirk Davis said, a rail operations supervisor for the logistics directorate at Fort Hood.
The soldiers' efforts came in the form of providing safety officers, and loading vehicles individually onto the tracks, a technique known as "circus loading," Davis said.
These efforts helped the brigade load more than 700 vehicles a day ahead of schedule, said 1st Lt. Michael O'Donnell, the brigade railhead operations officer-in-charge.
Because of months of planning, coordination and rehearsal of the operations to make sure logistical support for the training center is a success, the operations went quite smoothly, O'Donnell said.
"It takes a lot of coordination, especially working with the civilians but it's not hard at all," he said.
Experience of the soldiers and civilians was another contributing factor for the success of the operations, O'Donnell said. Most of the noncommissioned officers working for him added to the efforts by being safeties and providing guidance to the inexperienced.
Spc. Blaze Fuller, with the 3rd Battalion, 82nd Field Artillery Regiment, 2nd Brigade Combat Team, 1st Cavalry Division, said he has never seen a rail operation run so efficiently.
Fuller said he received thorough briefings on the how the operation would take place, which enabled him to perform.
Overall, the rail operation was a success, O'Donnell said. Because of the coordination, timing and hard work by every soldier and civilian, the transport of the vehicles will ensure a promising rotation through the Joint Readiness Training Center.

description.hltext_display: El Ibex 35 sube levemente y se coloca por encima de resistencias
description.content: El índice de referencia de la bolsa española abre la sesión con moderados ascensos, colocándose por encima de resistencias, después de la fuerte subida de ayer que le valió para conquistar los 10.200 puntos por los pelos. Además, Wall Street se unió a la fiesta y el Dow Jones superó también niveles importantes. El euro sube levemente frente al dólar.

description.hltext_display: Maisa Järvelä: Herkullista joulua
description.content:
Kokkola-lehti | Päivitetty: 22.12.2010
Tulis jo joulu, niin yölläkin sais syödä, huokaillaan vanhassa suomalaisessa sananlaskussa. Sanonnan syntyaikaan ruokaa oli niukasti ja tapa oli jättää jouluyöksi ruuat pöytään.
Nykyään ei pulaa ole. Kai me useimmat ylenpalttisuuteen sorrumme, vaikka joka vuosi lupaamme satsata laatuun määrän sijasta. Viimeistään välipäivinä katumus iskee.
Ennaltaehkäisy ja varhainen puuttuminen ovat nykyajan suosikkisanontoja. Maanantaina Helsingin Sanomat antoi aseita ylensyönnin torjumiseen. Elämä-sivulla oli otsikolla Suhteellinen joulu listattu jouluherkkuja. Kukin annos oli määrältään 200 kaloria eli kymmenesosa päivän energiantarpeesta.
Mitä sitten 200 kalorilla saa suuhunsa mättää? Makeisosastolla se tarkoittaa neljää suklaakonvehtia, kolmea vihreää kuulaa tai kuutta palaa Fazerin sinistä. Leivonnaisista yksi joulutorttu sisältää saman verran. Omenoita saa samaan kalorimäärään popsia neljä. Siinähän tulee vasta puolet päivän tarpeesta, ei paha.
Ruokalautaselle voi vastaavasti lastata puoli kiloa (!) rosollia, 143 grammaa rasvatonta kinkkua, 167 grammaa lanttu- ja porkkanalaatikkoa molempia sekä 108 grammaa graavilohta. Siinäpä se toinen tonni.
Jos enemmän haluaa syödä, on lähdettävä liikkeelle. 200 kaloria kuluu noin puolen tunnin hiihdolla tai luistelulla, tunnin kävelyllä tai 2,5 tunnin lautapelailulla.
Toisaalta – tuttuihin sanontoihin kuuluu tämäkin: ”On sama, mitä syö joulun ja uudenvuoden välillä. Merkityksellistä on, mitä syö uudenvuoden ja joulun välillä.”
Eli nauttikaamme joulun kaikista puolista!

description.hltext_display: HK stocks edge up in thin turnover, Cheung Kong gains
description.content:
Share on Facebook
Related Topics
Quotes
HONG KONG, Dec 22 (Reuters) - Hong Kong stocks edged higher on Wednesday despite a reversal in mainland markets, although a year-end slowdown in trading activity kept turnover at its lowest in more than 3-½ months.
The benchmark Hang Seng Index .HSI closed up 0.22 percent at 23,045.19. The China Enterprises Index .HSCE ended flat as mainland markets reversed course to close lower on the day.
Li Ka-shing's Cheung Kong (Holdings) Ltd (0001.HK) was the biggest boost to the benchmark, rising 3.5 percent after the company said it planned to launch Hong Kong's first yuan-denominated IPO as early as next year. [ID:nTOE6BL01N] (Reporting by Vikram Subhedar; Editing by Chris Lewis) (vikram.subhedar@thomsonreuters.com; +852 2843 6975; Reuters Messaging: vikram.subhedar.reuters.com@reuters.net))

description.hltext_display: Antti Savela: Köyhää ei kuunnella
description.content:
Antti Savela antti.savela@kpk.fi
Kuva: Jukka LehojŠrvi
Parlamentaarinen Sata-komitea mietti, miten köyhyyttä voidaan kitkeä. Johtopäätöksenä eduskunta sääti muun muassa takuueläkkeen, jolla pienimpiä eläkkeitä korotetaan 678 euroon kuukaudessa. Samalla joitakin pienimpiä etuuksia korotettiin hiukan, hallituksen mielestä paljonkin.
Sata-komitea kuuli
asiantuntijoina sosiaalipolitiikan tutkijoita ja virkamiehiä. Hyvä niinkin. Olisi kuitenkin ollut kohtuullista tiedustella todellisilta köyhyyden asiantuntijoilta – esimerkiksi pelkällä työmarkkinatuella elävältä – , kuinka ihmeessä hän pystyy tulemaan toimeen 30 päivää ja yötä 400 eurolla. Tai miten kahden lapsen perhe elää kuukauden 1 200 eurolla, jollaiseksi on määritelty perheen tulot toimeentulokriteerien mukaan.
Komitealaiset olisivat voineet
kuulla monenlaisia tarinoita siitä, miten laitetaan edullista ruokaa, kuinka kierrätetään vaatteita ja kuinka köyhien lapsille riittää halvemmat harrastukset kuin rikkaiden tenaville.
Televisiossa esitetään kaikenlaista tositeeveetä. Alkoholiongelmaisia on ollut katkolla, ja viimeksi syrjäytyneitä nuoria peloteltiin sulkemalla heidät määräajaksi vankilaan. Jonkinlaista formaattia voisi kokeilla päättäjiin. Annetaan joukolle kansanedustajia 400 euroa käteen ja katsotaan, miten he pärjäävät oikeassa elämässä ilman isoa palkkaa, puoluetukiaisia, kulukorvauksia, taksiseteleitä, valiokuntamatkoja ja ilmaisia lounaita. Edes kuukauden köyhäily voisi tuoda uutta tulokulmaa päätöksentekoon.
Köyhyys ei nimittäin
ole luonnonlaki. Eriarvoisuus on poliittinen valinta. Sitä lisätään tai vähennetään verotuksella ja perusturvaa muuttamalla. Railon lavennus alkoi Lipposen hallituksesta ja sen jälkeen työtä ovat tehneet viralliset porvarit. Vuodesta 1990 pienituloisten määrä on kasvanut 395 000:sta 696 000:een vuoteen 2008 mennessä. Sosiaalietuuksien ja lapsilisien arvo on jäänyt 30 prosentilla yleisestä ansiokehityksestä. Näin siis aikana jolloin bruttokansantuote on noussut jo poutapilvien yläpuolelle.
Kirjoittaja on toimittaja Keskipohjanmaan Haapajärven aluetoimituksessa.

description.hltext_display: Seppo Kangas: Joulumielen metsästystä
description.content:
Kun omat lapset olivat vielä pieniä, joulun odotuksen yksi huipennus oli kuusenhakureissu. Itselleni sillä oli erityinen merkitys. Se tarkoitti minulle joulunajan alkua.
Kuusi haettiin Onnusesta velipojan metsästä. Lupa oli kysytty ja saatu jokajouluinen vastaus: ”Hae pois, kunhan jätät minullekin jonkun puun pystyyn.” Reissun jännitys alkoi jo siitä, miten hyvin palstalle johtava metsäautotie oli aurattu. Joskus piti lainata veljeltä nelivetoa.
Kaksi vanhinta lastamme on poikia, ja ainakin he olivat joulukuusimetsässä mukana. Usein matkaan lähti poikien äitikin sekä pappa, joskus mummokin. Parhaisiin reissuihin varauduttiin eväillä. Sytytettiin nuotio ja paistettiin makkarat.
Itse kuusen valinta oli tarkkaa työtä. Isäni neuvojen mukaan etsittiin yksilöä, jossa on vahvat, ylöspäin sojottavat tiheät ja tasaiset oksat. Neulasten piti olla terveet ja syvän vihreät. Kierorunkoinen ei pysyisi kuusenjalassa pystyssä. Viimeisenä vaatimuksena vielä oli, ettei kuusen kaadolla aiheutettu metsätaloudellista menetystä. Aukkopaikkaa ei saanut joulukuusen takia metsään jättää.
Joskus sitä oikeaa metsästettiin pimeästä pimeään. Luntakin saattoi olla vyötäisille saakka, ja jos hyvä kuusi sattui silmään hiukan kauempana tiestä, sitäpä saikin hikipäin kiskoa tien laitaan.
Yksi kuusi on jäänyt iäksi mieleen. Poikkeuksellisesti etsimme kuusta myös istutusmetsästä, joka oli juuri sopivassa kasvuvaiheessa. Isäukko kyllä muisti teroittaa, että vain tiheästä puskasta otetaan, jos hyvä löytyy. Satuttiin viimein paikkaan, jossa neljän isomman kuusen keskeltä pilkotti nätti pieni kuusi. Se oli jäänyt toisten varjoon ja kasvanut hiukan kituen niin tiheäksi, ettei runkoa näkynyt oksiston läpi. Niin sopivasti se oli saanut kasvaa, että se oli aivan tasainen joka suunnasta.
Sitä kuusta käytiin kauempaakin ihailemassa. Se oli kuin Disneyn piirretyistä: tasaisen kartion muotoinen, umpitiheä, vihreä kuin valtameri. Eikä se edes varissut.
Kun lapset kasvoivat, kuusenhakureissut jäivät. Ensin kannettiin ostokuusi kotiin. Sittemmin joulupuun viran valtasi Kiinan pojan tekemä muovihäkkyrä.
Joulumieli tulee nyt muualta kuin kuusimetsästä. Se tulee Maliskylän kappelin aattohartaudesta, hautakynttilöistä, joulusaunasta, jouluvirrestä ja -evankeliumista ennen ruokaa. Perinteistä se tulee.

description.content:

description.hltext_display: Liikenteessä kuoli useita tuiskuisen marraskuun aikana
description.content:
Ke 10:17 (STT)
Tieliikenteessä kuoli lähes tuplasti enemmän ihmisiä marraskuussa kuin vuosi sitten. Kuolleita oli yhdeksän enemmän ja loukkaantuneita 96 enemmän kuin viime vuonna, kertoo Tilastokeskus.
– Viime vuonna marraskuu oli aika lailla musta. Nyt lumikelit ja liukkaat säät tulivat aiemmin, sanoo aktuaari Raini Östlund Tilastokeskuksesta.
Tieliikenteessä sattui marraskuussa 474 henkilövahinkoon johtanutta onnettomuutta. Niissä loukkaantui yli 600 ihmistä ja kuoli 19.
Kuolleista 15 oli autoilijoita. Lisäksi kuoli kolme jalankulkijaa ja yksi polkupyöräilijä. Valtaosa kuolleista oli miehiä.
Marraskuun kuolleisuusluvut muodostavat vain pienen piikin tilastoissa. Tieliikenteessä kuolleiden määrä on jatkuvasti laskenut viimeisen kahdenkymmenen vuoden ajan, kertoo Tilastokeskus.

description.hltext_display: IIHS Announces 66 Winners of 2011 Top Safety Pick Award - VIDEO ENHANCED
description.content:
AUTOMAKERS QUICKLY IMPROVE ROOFS TO BOOST ROLLOVER PROTECTION
ARLINGTON, VA - December 22, 2010: Sixty-six vehicles earn the Insurance Institute for Highway Safety?s TOP SAFETY PICK award for 2011 (list on p.2), including 40 cars, 25 SUVs, and a minivan. TOP SAFETY PICK recognizes vehicles that do the best job of protecting people in front, side, rollover, and rear crashes based on good ratings in Institute tests. Winners also must have available electronic stability control, a crash avoidance feature that significantly reduces crash risk. The ratings help consumers pick vehicles that offer a higher level of protection than federal safety standards require.
Last year the Institute toughened criteria for TOP SAFETY PICK by adding a requirement that all qualifiers must earn a good rating for performance in a roof strength test to assess protection in a rollover crash. The move sharply narrowed the initial field of 2010 winners. At the beginning of the 2010 model year, only 27 vehicles qualified for the award, but the number grew to 58 as auto manufacturers reworked existing designs and introduced new models. Now another 10 vehicles join the winners? list for 2011. Two discontinued models drop off. ?In just a year, automakers have more than doubled the number of vehicles that meet the criteria for TOP SAFETY PICK,? says Adrian Lund, the Institute?s president. ?That gives consumers shopping for a safer new car or SUV ? from economy to luxury models ? plenty of choices to consider in most dealer showrooms. In fact, every major automaker has at least one winning model this year.? Front-runners:
Hyundai/Kia and Volkswagen/Audi each have 9 winners for 2011. Next in line with 8 awards apiece are General Motors, Ford/Lincoln, and Toyota/Lexus/Scion. Subaru is the only manufacturer with a winner in all the vehicle classes in which it competes. Subaru earns 5 awards for 2011. ?Safety is a priority among this crop of winners,? Lund says. ?From the start these manufacturers set out to design vehicles that would earn TOP SAFETY PICK, even though we?ve made it harder to win.? One of them is Ford. For 2011, the automaker is rolling out a new design for its popular Explorer midsize SUV, which until now had never earned TOP SAFETY PICK. Ford also upgraded the roofs of 2 other midsize SUVs, the Ford Flex and Lincoln MKT, along with the Ford Fusion and Lincoln MKZ, 2 midsize cars that missed the initial round of 2010 winners because they lacked the required roof strength. The all-new Ford Fiesta rounds out Ford?s winners and is the only minicar to earn TOP SAFETY PICK this year. General Motors? new Chevrolet Cruze broadens the number of award-winning options for consumers looking to buy a fuel-efficient small car. GM built the Cruze, which has 10 standard airbags, including ones for the knees, to outperform the government?s minimum roof strength requirements and touts the achievement as a selling point.
The redesigned Volkswagen Touareg is the only large SUV to earn TOP SAFETY PICK for 2011. The Institute doesn?t normally evaluate SUVs this large, but Volkswagen requested crash tests to demonstrate the Touareg?s crashworthiness. None of the small pickups the Institute has evaluated qualified for this year?s award, and large pickups haven?t yet been tested. The Institute awarded the first TOP SAFETY PICK to 2006 models and then raised the bar the next year by requiring good rear test results and electronic stability control as either standard or optional equipment. With last year?s addition of new criteria for roof crush the Institute?s crash test ratings now cover all 4 of the most common kinds of crashes.
More than 12,000 people died in frontal crashes of passenger vehicles in 2009 in the United States, more than 6,000 died in side impacts, and more than 8,000 died in rollovers, many of which also involved a front or side impact. Rear-end crashes usually aren?t fatal but result in a large proportion of injuries. Neck sprain or strain is the most commonly reported injury in two-thirds of insurance claims for injuries in all kinds of crashes. Vehicles rated good for rollover crash protection have roofs more than twice as strong as the current federal standard requires. The Institute estimates that such roofs reduce the risk of serious and fatal injury in single-vehicle rollovers by about 50 percent compared with roofs meeting the minimum requirement.
Quick strides in occupant protection:
When the first roof crush results were released in March 2009, only a third of the SUVs tested had good roofs. Since then about 113 vehicles have been tested, and the majority are rated good for roof strength. Hyundai is a case in point. The Tucson and the small SUV?s twin, the Kia Sportage, earned a poor rating for roof strength in 2009, with the weakest roof among all of the small SUVs evaluated that year. A redesign helped the 2011 models secure a good rating and TOP SAFETY PICK. Hyundai also improved the roof on another SUV, the midsize Santa Fe, and redesigned the Sonata, a midsize car that had earned a marginal roof rating the first time around.
The outlook for side-impact protection has brightened, too, Lund notes. Many cars failed the side test the Institute began conducting in 2003, but now most vehicles ace the test thanks to stronger side structures and standard side airbags that protect the head and torso. It?s an important improvement because new Institute research shows that the risk of dying in a crash is sharply lower for people in vehicles that earn good ratings in the Institute?s side test. Chrysler added torso airbags to the redesigned Jeep Grand Cherokee to bolster side crash protection and earn a good side rating. The previous design relied on head curtain airbags to cushion occupants in side crashes and only rated marginal for side protection.
Safety equipment is increasingly standard. Ninety-two percent of 2011 model cars, 94 percent of SUVs, and 56 percent of pickups have standard head and torso side airbags. Electronic stability control is standard on 92 percent of cars, 100 percent of SUVs, and 72 percent of pickups. ?Automakers deserve credit for quickly rising to meet the more-challenging criteria for TOP SAFETY PICK,? Lund says. ?Several already have requested tests for new models due to ship early next year, so we expect to add even more winners to the 2011 list.? The Institute groups TOP SAFETY PICK winners according to vehicle type and size. Lund advises consumers to keep in mind that size and weight influence crashworthiness. Larger, heavier vehicles generally afford better occupant protection in serious crashes than smaller, lighter ones. Even with a TOP SAFETY PICK, a small car isn?t as crashworthy as a bigger one.
How vehicles are evaluated: The Institute?s frontal crashworthiness evaluations are based on results of 40 mph frontal offset crash tests. Each vehicle?s overall evaluation is based on measurements of intrusion into the occupant compartment, injury measures recorded on a 50th percentile male Hybrid III dummy in the driver seat, and analysis of slow-motion film to assess how well the restraint system controlled dummy movement during the test.
Side evaluations are based on performance in a crash test in which the side of a vehicle is struck by a barrier moving at 31 mph. The barrier represents the front end of a pickup or SUV. Ratings reflect injury measures recorded on 2 instrumented SID-IIs dummies representing a 5th percentile woman, assessment of head protection countermeasures, and the vehicle?s structural performance during the impact.
In the roof strength test, a metal plate is pushed against 1 side of a roof at a displacement rate of 0.2 inch per second. To earn a good rating for rollover protection, the roof must withstand a force of 4 times the vehicle?s weight before reaching 5 inches of crush. This is called a strength-to-weight ratio.
Rear crash protection is rated according to a two-step procedure. Starting points for the ratings are measurements of head restraint geometry ? the height of a restraint and its horizontal distance behind the back of the head of an average-size man.
Seat/head restraints with good or acceptable geometry are tested dynamically using a dummy that measures forces on the neck. This test simulates a collision in which a stationary vehicle is struck in the rear at 20 mph. Seats without good or acceptable geometry are rated poor overall because they can?t be positioned to protect many people.
ALL 66 WINNERS
Large cars Buick LaCrosse Buick Regal BMW 5 series (except 4-wheel drive and V8)
Midsize cars Audi A3 Audi A4 sedan
Small cars Chevrolet Cruze Honda Civic 4-door models (except Si) with optional electronic stability control
Minicar Ford Fiesta sedan and hatchback built after July 2010
Minivan Toyota Sienna
Large SUV Volkswagen Touareg
Midsize SUVs Audi Q5 Cadillac SRX Chevrolet Equinox Dodge Journey Ford Explorer Ford Flex GMC Terrain Hyundai Santa Fe Jeep Grand Cherokee Kia Sorento built after March 2010 Small SUVs Honda Element Hyundai Tucson Jeep Patriot with optional side torso airbags

description.hltext_display: Ministerie mag SAP voortrekken in aanbesteding
description.content:
Gepubliceerd: Dinsdag 21 december 2010 Auteur: René Schoemaker
Oracle heeft een rechtszaak verloren waarin het protesteerde tegen de voorkeur voor SAP als leverancier van een financieel systeem voor enkele ministeries. De rechter vond de aanbesteding rechtmatig. Oracle bezint zich op eventuele vervolgstappen, zo laat het bedrijf in een verklaring weten. De softwarereus is woedend omdat het ministerie van Financiën in de aanbesteding voor een gezamenlijk financieel systeem voor meerdere ministeries expliciet vroeg naar levering, onderhoud en support van 765 SAP-licenties. Daarmee vond Oracle dat zij al bij voorbaat werd uitgesloten van mededinging in de aanbesteding.
De ministeries van Sociale Zaken, Volksgezondheid en Financiën willen samen een gezamenlijke organisatie opzetten voor de financiële administratie. Daartoe zou verder moeten worden gebouwd op het bestaande SAP-systeem van Sociale Zaken. De Europese aanbesteding van het project, dat door de ministeries ‘3F’ is genoemd, ging uit van die doelstelling.
Vervang SAP complex en kostbaar
In de aanbestedingsformulieren wordt de keuze voor hergebruik van het bestaande SAP-systeem gemotiveerd met een verwijzing naar ‘vervangingsvraagstukken op automatiseringsgebied’ die dermate complex en kostbaar zijn dat deze voor relatief kleine(re) ministeries zelfstandig niet tot een goed einde te brengen zijn, zo valt te lezen op de website van Binnenlands Bestuur.
De aanbesteding is van de zomer gedaan en Oracle maakte daarop direct bezwaar. Het bedrijf stapte vervolgens naar de rechter. “Op de markt voor grote bedrijfssoftwaresystemen is slechts een beperkt aantal leveranciers aanwezig”, zo motiveert Oracle in een uitgegeven verklaring. “De adresseerbare markt binnen de overheid is voor deze leveranciers zeer beperkt.”
Geen mededinging
“Zoals de aanbesteding voor 3F nu is opgezet, betekent dit, dat zonder enige vorm van mededinging, twee (Financiën en Volksgezondheid, red) van de elf ministeries aan een voorkeursleverancier wordt toegekend en dat op deze manier voor andere leveranciers een substantieel deel van de potentiële markt wegvalt. Het aanbestedingsrecht heeft als doel een open marktwerking te creëren met gelijke kansen voor alle inschrijvers”, voert Oracle verder aan.
De rechter heeft de bezwaren van Oracle dus niet gevolgd en de aanbesteding als rechtmatig beoordeeld. Onduidelijk is nog welke motivatie daaraan ten grondslag ligt. Zowel Oracle als het ministerie kon daar op dit moment niets over zeggen.
Vendor lock-in
Oracle zegt wel dat de uitspraak softwareleveranciers de mogelijkheid geeft hun softwareportfolio op dezelfde wijze uit te breiden bij bestaande overheidsklanten. Dat houdt wel in dat ministeries via die gedachte kiezen voor een vrijwillige ‘vendor lock-in’. Indien andere departementen de werkwijze volgen van de drie genoemde ministeries lijkt Oracle wat betreft financiële systemen geen rol meer te spelen.
De gunning van de opdracht zou dit najaar zijn, maar werd door de rechtszaak uitgesteld. De waarde van de raamovereenkomst, die drie jaar moet lopen, is geraamd op 3 miljoen euro.

description.hltext_display: Rehab staffer accuses Lohan of battery, then fired
description.content:
A day that began with authorities confirming Lindsay Lohan was being investigated for battery on a female staffer at a California rehab facility treating the starlet ended with the worker fired after giving an interview about the incident.
Riverside County sheriff's detectives said Tuesday they are investigating the "Mean Girls" star for an alleged altercation with a worker at a Betty Ford Center facility in Palm Desert that occurred after 1 a.m. on Dec. 12.
The agency declined to say what prompted the fight, but said the worker was interested in pursuing charges against Lohan.
Betty Ford spokesman Russ Patrick said the staffer was fired for identifying patients at the center in an interview and "disclosing a privileged document."
Although Betty Ford and the sheriff's department did not identify the worker, she appeared in an interview on celebrity website TMZ on Tuesday afternoon and was promptly fired. She claims the 24-year-old Lohan and two other girls had sneaked out of the facility.
In the video, Dawn Holland claims she was trying to get Lohan to submit to a breathalyzer test when the actress became belligerent, pushed her and snatched a phone from her hand, straining her arm.
Attempts to reach Holland were unsuccessful. A phone number registered to her was not accepting calls Tuesday evening.
Lohan has not been arrested or charged in the incident. Her attorney, Shawn Chapman Holley, said in an e-mailed statement that it was the actress who called for police.
She declined to offer additional details, citing the ongoing sheriff's investigation.
While the fallout for Holland was swift, Lohan's situation remains unclear. A judge has ordered her to remain at Betty Ford until Jan. 3 and remain out of trouble until Feb. 25. He also ordered her to submit to all drug and alcohol screenings or face up to six months in jail for violating her probation on a 3-year-old drunk driving case.
Riverside County sheriff's Deputy Herlinda Valenzuela said Lohan's case would be presented to prosecutors, who will decide whether Lohan faces a new charge.
Lohan has been receiving treatment at the Betty Ford Center and its facilities, about 120 miles east of Los Angeles, since late September.
Patrick's statement said that until Tuesday, Betty Ford had upheld the confidentiality of 96,000 patients who had received treatment there since it opened in 1982.
He said Holland's interview was a breach of trust and the rehab process.
"When patients come to the center for treatment, they come to a safe place where their identity is protected, where anonymity is safeguarded," he said in an e-mail. "Their simple priority when in treatment is to learn how to live a life free of alcohol and other drugs.
"Confidentiality and trust are key to the treatment and recovery process."
Lohan's stint at Betty Ford is her fifth stay in rehab and her second this year.
Beginning in July, she was jailed for 14 days, followed by three weeks at inpatient rehab. Los Angeles Superior Court Judge Elden S. Fox agreed to release her early from treatment at Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center in late August based on doctor's recommendations.

description.hltext_display: 包皮系带断裂该怎么办?北京慈康医院
description.content:
妻生活后，第二天居然发现自己下部有出血现象，龟头处还有裂痕，不知道是怎么回事，于是来到了北京慈康医院泌尿外科中心检查，结果出来后，医生告诉小李，是由于包皮系带断裂引起的。
什么是包皮系带断裂?
包皮系带位于包皮内龟头腹下部，通过冠状沟与龟头尿道口下方相连。其伸缩力较强，在阴茎勃起时可明显伸长，当阴茎软缩时则明显缩短。包皮系带断裂多为性交用力过大、用力不当造成，多发生于包皮过长的人。手淫猛烈或性交活动过于粗暴均可导致包皮系带断裂，或者完全断离。包皮系带断裂可能造成阴茎勃起弯曲或疼痛，而影响今后的性生活，建议您可到专业的医院生殖整形科就诊，检查是否需要缝合及是否有包皮过长，以便及时治疗。
造成包皮系带断裂的原因?
造成包皮系带断裂因素主要是用力超负荷而致，如手淫时由于怕人看见想快速射精，于是动作多剧烈，以此来增加局部刺激。在此情况下，十分容易引起包皮系带断裂。其次在新婚之夜，由于男方缺乏性知识，在性交时过于急躁而又凶猛，或因处女膜坚韧，或因阴道痉挛，在阴茎强行插入的同时，由于阻力的关系造成包皮牵拉包皮系带而引起包皮系带断裂。
包皮系带断裂的症状?
1、当包皮系带撕裂后，患者会感到撕裂处的疼痛，以及较多的还伴有出血现象。
2、包皮系带撕裂较轻微的，只有系带部位在龟头处裂开，严重的则可见系带自龟头处完全断离。
3、由于阴茎发育情况不同，包皮系带的长短和紧张度也有很大差异。如果包皮系带短而紧的话，龟头在勃起时就会偏向下方，并可能因为性交时用力过猛而扯裂，引起出血疼痛。
4、包皮带断裂多为性交用力过大、用力不当造成，多发生于包皮过长的人。
包皮系带断裂的治疗方法?
首先，包皮系带断裂后不必慌张，在就医前可以先清洗一下，并对包皮消毒包扎，然后简单压迫止血，以防感染。如发生出血不止的情况应去立即医院。专家提醒患者，如果存在包皮过长，还是建议去医院做包皮环切。
其次，北京慈康医院泌尿外科中心推荐采用――无痛韩式整形术治疗。无痛韩式整形术具有以下特点：
特点1、手术精准，精准定位，为患者定制个性化手术方案;
特点2、时间超短，只需15分钟，即可解除男性包袱;
特点3、外观平滑，术后光整平滑，让夫妻生活更加和谐;
特点4、微创安全，不伤及性感传导神经，不影响生长发育。
由此可见，包皮系带断裂并非小事情，如果患者不在意，可能引起等更严重的后果，因此，北京慈康医院专家建议患者在包皮系带断裂后应该立即到医院进行就医，尤其是包皮过长患者引起的包皮系带断裂，应该进行包皮手术进行治疗，以免遗留后患。
北京慈康医院咨询电话：010-51660966

description.hltext_display: Oil rises above $90 amid US crude supply drop
description.content:
Oil prices rose above $90 a barrel Wednesday in Asia after a report showed U.S. crude supplies dropped more than expected for a second week, which suggests demand is improving.
Benchmark oil for February delivery was up 20 cents to $90.02 a barrel at midday Singapore time in electronic trading on the New York Mercantile Exchange. The contract rose 45 cents to settle at $89.82 on Tuesday.
The American Petroleum Institute said late Tuesday that crude inventories fell 5.8 million barrels last week while analysts surveyed by Platts, the energy information arm of McGraw-Hill Cos., had forecast a drop of 2.4 million barrels. Inventories of gasoline decreased 2.9 million barrels and distillates rose slightly, the API said.
The Energy Department's Energy Information Administration reports its weekly supply data later Wednesday. The EIA said last week that supplies dropped 9.9 million barrels the previous week, the biggest drop in eight years.
Oil prices, which rose to a two-year high above $90 earlier this month, have been supported by rallying stock markets. Meanwhile, a strengthening U.S. dollar, which makes crude more expensive for investors with other currencies, has weighed on oil.
"A steady-higher stock market continues to provide a major counter against a likely renewed weakening in the euro," Ritterbusch and Associates said in a report. "A choppy, sideways trade could persist through the balance of this year."
In other Nymex trading in January contracts, heating oil rose 0.4 cent to $2.52 a gallon, gasoline futures added 1.4 cents to $2.41 a gallon and natural gas advanced 0.8 cent to $4.07 per 1,000 cubic feet.
In London, Brent crude rose 23 cents to $93.43 a barrel on the ICE Futures exchange.

description.hltext_display: ‘Tis the season for rail gunners
description.content:
41st Fires Brigade Public Affairs
FORT HOOD — Soldiers throughout the 41st Fires Brigade dug deep into their hearts and pockets to donate toys for the children in the Fort Hood Exceptional Family Member Program during its annual toy drive Dec. 3.
This is the second annual program toy drive supported by the brigade, and hundreds of new toys for children of various ages were donated in support of Fort Hood's EFMP program.
"We are thankful for the 41st Fires' participation," said Stephania Williams, a social service representative for EFMP.
"The 41st Fires Brigade has donated more than 200 toys this year and our kids will be very grateful for their contributions.
"For some of the children, these toys will be the only toys they receive for Christmas."
Sgt. Leandra Sotello, Headquarters and Headquarters Battery, from Las Banos, Calif., donated to help other families.
"I think the kids will be happy and feel special because some do not receive gifts because of medical costs," Sotello said.
"It feels good to help other families in the Army."
The brigade was assisted in the drive by corporate sponsors who donated toys and increased the contribution size.
"Seven hundred dollars worth of toys were also donated from AUSA Corporation, our corporate sponsors," said Maj. Michael Smith, battalion executive officer for the 1st Battalion, 21st Field Artillery Regiment, 41st Fires Brigade, and a native of Chicago.
"During the season of giving, we hope we have fulfilled a child's Christmas wish."

description.hltext_display: 阳痿早泄治疗有什么区别?北京哪家医院治疗好?
description.content:
阳痿早泄治疗有什么区别？北京哪家医院治疗好？阳痿和早泄似乎像一对同胞兄弟一样出现在人们的话题中，有患者来就诊时这样告诉医生“医生我得阳痿早泄，我要治疗阳痿早泄”。这个讲出来是个笑话，却是很常见的事情。闹出这样笑话的原因，是患者朋友将阳痿和早泄混为一谈了，他们把阳痿和早泄当做是一个病情来看态了，阳痿和早泄同属于男性性功能障碍问题，但他们在定义与治疗方法是不一样的。
阳痿早泄治疗有什么区别？首先从定义上进行区分：
什么是阳痿？
阳痿就是勃起功能障碍(ED)的俗称，是指阴茎不能足够达到或者维持勃起，从而无法完成满意的性生活。从病因上来分，阳痿有器质性阳痿和心理性阳痿两大类。器质性阳痿又有血管性阳痿、内分泌性阳痿、神经性阳痿等。
什么是早泄？
早泄(Ejaculation)是指射精发生在阴茎进入阴道之前，或进入阴道中时间较短，在女性尚未达到性高潮，提早射精而出现的性交不和谐障碍。早泄的诊断标准在于女方是否满足。类型分为器质性(疾病引起)和非器质性(心理性，习惯性，及因包皮过长等正常原因引发的射精过快现象)
阳痿早泄治疗有什么区别？治疗方法上的不同
北京哪家医院治疗好？阳痿的治疗主要可归类为四种：
一、心理治疗：除器质性病变能引起阳痿外，心理因素也占据了很重要的位置。
精神心理因素是导致阳痿的重要原因之一。所以在治疗精神性阳痿的时候，心理治疗显得尤为重要。男性患病后，妻子的心理治疗作用很明显。夫妻间要互相信任、尊重，并经常交流感情，妻子对丈夫应该温柔体贴、主动为性生活创造轻松、和谐愉快的气氛，切勿冷嘲热讽，样只会让丈夫的阳痿越来越严重。完美的性生活就像是击掌，男女双方都要积极配合才能完成的。所以不管夫妻哪一方出现问题，对方都要给予无条件的关心与支持，夫妻生活才能更加美满。
二、药物治疗：ED治疗方法多样，药物治疗作为一线治疗，极大地减轻了患者的痛苦。
包括万艾可风靡世界的治疗“效应”。那么在万艾可之外，ED男性还应吃什么药，又该怎么食用这些药，用药的同时还应注意些什么?这些都是要到正规的医院，在医生的指导下，尊照医嘱用药，切不可自行用药，以便加深了病情。
三、行为治疗：主要是指，夫妻两个人共同通过性行为来达到治疗的目的。
治疗过程可以分为5个阶段来进行，但大致过程是爱抚-性刺激-控制射精-阴茎在阴道内活动-完成性生活，性行为疗法是一个循序渐进的过程。如果要想获得更为专业、更为全面的改善早泄的技巧，请咨询北京慈康医院“夫妻训练营”的专业性行为治疗专家。
治疗血管性阳痿的手术疗法
血管性ED是由于阴茎血管发生了一定的病变，使阴茎充血量不能满足勃起的需要。对于那些并无全身性重大疾病的患者首选的治疗方法一般是手术，如血管重建术。
治疗动脉性阳痿的手术疗法
阴茎的有效勃起，要依托阴茎动脉大量的血液注入阴茎海绵体，但是如果阴茎动脉发生血管病变，则会导致动脉性ED的产生。动脉搭桥术适用于这种情况。
静脉性ED的手术治疗
对于静脉性ED的治疗目前主要采用药物性治疗、理疗及手术治疗等方法。尤其是近几年，静脉性ED的手术治疗越来越受到医疗工作者的关注。临床上常用的有静脉阻断术。
北京哪家医院治疗好？早泄的治疗也可以归类为四种：
一、心理治疗：早泄和阳痿一样，大多数为精神性的，即为心理性。
它是受大脑病理性兴奋或脊髓中枢兴奋增强而影响的，而真正有器质性的病变只占早泄的很少一部分。所以调整自己的心理状态对于治疗早泄是非常关键的。不要担心早泄会发展成为阳瘘，避免色情放纵，情思过度，克服过度手淫的不良习惯，做到房事有节，起居有常。不要总是担心自己的性能力，多与妻子交流。
二、药物治疗：需要在医生指导下进行，以免延误病情或或导致其他病变。
许多患者不良使用麻醉剂、a受体阻滞剂、催眠剂导致神经损伤甚至导致阳痿以及其他恶性病变。所以在此不多展开，请在医生指导下进行。
三、行为治疗：上面治疗阳痿中提到的“夫妻训练营”在此同样适用。
四、手术治疗：北京慈康医院特色推荐“显微高选择性阴茎背神经阻断术”
该手术首次将显微技术引入其中，利用显微技术可以将阴茎背神经进行精细化的分离，这样就有效的避免了术后阴茎头部感觉持久减退和神经分离术后水肿疼痛的并发症。
目前，该手术已经在临床中治愈患者上百例，且术后患者恢复良好，夫妻反映性生活美满，双方较满意。我们可以自豪地说，高选择性阴茎背神经显微阻断术真正成了开启人们幸福之门的“金钥匙”。该手术的推出，真正成为国内早泄患者福音。
温馨提示：以上介绍了阳痿早泄治疗有什么区别？北京哪家医院治疗好？相信大家看后就明白，北京慈康医院打造京城男科、妇科第一品牌，医院汇聚名医长期坐诊，坚持以高效、快捷、温情、惠民、和谐为优质服务理念，全面推行“专家首诊负责制”健康服务和“一站式”微笑服务，为患者提供一个温馨、舒适、方便、快捷的就诊环境。如果您还有什么疑问，请点击左侧在线图标，直接在线咨询我们的男科专家。

description.hltext_display: SMA tour brings holiday cheer to troops
description.content:
Photo credit U.S. Army
Sgt. Maj. of the Army, Kenneth Preston poses for photos with troops from the 101st Airborne Division during the 2010 Sergeant Major of the Army Hope & Freedom Tour on Bagram Airfield, Afghanistan.
U.S. Army
Sgt. Maj. of the Army, Kenneth Preston poses for photos with troops from the 101st Airborne Division during the 2010 Sergeant Major of the Army Hope & Freedom Tour on Bagram Airfield, Afghanistan.
BAGRAM AIRFIELD, Afghanistan -- The Sergeant Major of the Army's 2010 USO Hope and Freedom tour headed out for southwest Asia Dec. 14. In tow, they brought six country music stars, two Dallas Cowboy cheerleaders and 18 members of The U.S. Army Band.
''Being a part of the tour, taking the entertainers over there is very important. It reminds the troops over there that back home within America, there are people thinking about them," said Sgt. Maj. Kenneth O. Preston, the sergeant major of the Army.
Preston said even though he wasn't involved with planning the first couple of tours, he was in attendance while deployed.
''It may not have been my type of music or comedian [on former tours], but it was a mental break from work," he said.
''The overall goal is to bring morale during the holiday season," said Sgt. 1st Class Christal Rheams, a vocalist with the Army Band's contemporary music ensemble Downrange. ''When you're away from home [during the holidays] your morale tends to slide. That's everybody."
The tour, sponsored by the United Service Organizations, brings together celebrities and musicians from the Army to perform for men and women serving in Operation Enduring Freedom. The tour lasts about two weeks and returns shortly before Christmas.
The country music stars joining the tour this year are Leeann Tweeden, Keni Thomas, Alana Grace, Buddy Jewell and Emily West. They will be joined by Nicole Hamilton and Brandy Redmond of the Dallas Cowboys cheerleaders and Chonda Pierce, a comedian.
''I'm so excited. I've dreamed of doing this for so long. My family and I really appreciate what the servicemembers do. For me it's a chance to go over and say thanks to hundreds at a time," said Jewell. ''It's an opportunity to see firsthand what the men and women have over there and what they live with on a daily basis. I know I'll come back with a deeper appreciation of what they do," he added.
''[The tour] began in 2002 with Sgt. Maj. of the Army Jack L. Tilley," explained Rheams. ''He kind of spearheaded the movement. He decided that there was such great music coming out of here [the Army Band] that it would be a great thing for the Soldiers deployed away from their Families to hear it."
Rheams added that the tour, if anything, has grown more over the years with the support from different organizations and the artists that join them. She said no tour is the same twice because there are so many variables.
There is no way to tell which bases will be visited, how long the shows will run or how long you'll stay at a base, she said. Even the transportation depends on what the base resources are.
''In my eight tours that I've done, I've made it to just about every major base in southwest Asia. As far as (foward) operating bases, I haven't seen as many as I would have liked," she said.
''We have artists that have come back from a forward operating base really emotional in mind [with] something they wanted to change or say," said Rheams.
It's these types of changes in the program that can extend a show from two to four-plus hours, she said.
''One time we were at this small base. We were getting gunned at, and the explosions were hitting closer. [The servicemembers] yelled at us to grab our gear, put it on, and we ran with them to the bunker," said Tweeden. ''It's something you know can happen going over, you don't want it to happen, but it can. It's more of a relief that you don't get hit than being scared."
Tweeden has been on 16 USO tours. She said when she went over with the chairman of the joint chiefs of staff she actually had the opportunity to see her [deployed] husband there twice. She saw him again on her last Sergeant Major of the Army tour.
''For someone that didn't serve in uniform this is my way of giving back to the servicemembers that fight for us," said Tweeden.
''It's such a huge honor to go over there and see the troops. I'm just real excited and can't wait to go," said Staff Sgt. Martha Krabill, Downrange vocalist.
''I'd like to make some type of difference to brighten their holiday," said Redmond. ''I left my husband and two-year-old at home. My sacrifice versus what these men and women do all year round is nothing," she added.
''I see many friends and people that I've served with in the past [on the tours]. I also make new friends. It's a wonderful experience," said Rheams.
Rheams shared a personal story about attending a friend's wedding. The best man approached her after the wedding and asked her if she had performed at his base. When she affirmed that she had, he said, ''I can't thank you enough for coming over and lifting our spirits the way you guys did during the holiday season. I really appreciate it, thank you."
''We were at Camp Phoenix in Afghanistan. It was freezing cold, the crowd was big and the performers did a four-hour show. Not one person left," said Jeff Thornton, USO tour manager.
The tour isn't all just performing. The entertainers also get to have fun.
''Last year I celebrated my birthday while on the tour. At Camp Victory [Kuwait} Mark Wills brought out a big cake and all the troops sang happy birthday to me," said Grace. ''It was great because it was all in unison they were all singing at the same pace."
''I don't think there's any better cause for me than to bring the morale up of those men and women that put their lives and their families on hold from day-to-day just so that I can be free," said Rheams. ''That's the reason I joined the Army. Every Christmas, I can't see myself anywhere else."

description.hltext_display: 羊肉对癫痫患者有危害吗？
description.content:
http://www.qianlong.com/2010-12-22 10:15:23千龙网
婴儿癫痫| 少儿癫痫 | 成人癫痫 | 羊癫风
羊角风| 羊羔风 | 轻度癫痫 | 头痛型癫痫
老年癫痫| 脑外伤癫痫 | 颞叶癫痫病
癫痫俗称“羊角风”是一种神经上的慢性疾病，需要长时间的治疗，但在治疗过程中不仅需要药物的治疗还要有营养的食物，那么癫痫患者吃羊肉有好处吗？民间传说怀孕时吃羊肉小孩会得癫痫病，这种说法对吗?会不会遗传?
癫痫治疗专家指出：就羊肉而言，生羊肉中含有一种病菌称布鲁氏干菌，是会致人脑部神经发生损害，其病菌在人体免疫低下的情况下容易感染，其发病症状和癫痫极为相似现称特异性癫痫。不过80年代后这种特异性癫痫非常少见了，这也说明人们的饮食质量有了很大的提高。这种癫痫治疗多按癫痫治疗，由于药物的毒副作用致脑植物神经中毒发生麻痹发生痴呆，如果患者确系此病菌感染，也不会遗传。
癫痫治疗专家强调：怀孕时吃羊肉和小孩子得癫痫病没有关系，除非这个羊肉是病羊。关于癫痫病遗传的问题，如果说是原发性癫痫，有可能遗传，但是遗传几率不大，关键是注意孕育期和分娩时的保健预防工作。
癫痫治疗专家提醒：就拿肉类食物来说，癫痫患者和常人一样，都可以使用，但是这里提醒大家，一定注意禽肉的卫生安全，不要吃带有疾病的肉类。
北京德胜门中医院癫痫治疗中心咨询电话：010-83266656、83266657
【进入北京德胜门中医院癫痫治疗中心专题>>】

description.hltext_display: Defense lifts Lincoln to win
description.author: JUSTIN WULF
description.content:
Next Page 1 | 2 Previous Page Defense, which has become a Lincoln boys basketball trademark, was once again the key to victory as the Patriots smothered the Brandon Valley offense for a 68-44 win at home Tuesday night.Lincoln coach Jeff Halseth says the defense has been one of the focal points during the Patriots' 3-1 start. The coach was happy to see the trend continue despite last week's loss to top-ranked O'Gorman, in which the Pats struggled to contain the Knights' offensive weapons.
"That's our reputation around here. Lincoln is known to play good, solid defense and make teams work to get shots," Halseth said. "(The boys) believe in it. They're fired up when they play good defense." "We kind of panicked (against O'Gorman)," added Lincoln forward Trey Naasz, who had 10 points and eight rebounds Tuesday night. "We pushed the defense all week, and it led the way tonight."Also different from last Thursday's loss was an up-tempo Patriot offense that controlled the pace for much of the game.Trailing 7-5 in the first quarter, Lincoln used a 10-0 run in the final three minutes to grab the lead as the defense made it difficult for the Lynx (1-2) to execute offensively.A similar 11-2 stretch in the second quarter provided Lincoln with a 30-15 lead with 2:07 left in the first half.
Patriots forward Will Hieber was one of many catalysts during the early runs, as the senior went 3-for-3 from 3-point range in the first half for nine of his game-high 17 points. Nick Goeman added 10 points on 5 of 6 shooting from the field."We were able to put the ball in the basket," said Halseth, whose team led 32-19 at halftime. "We got some good looks and guys finally felt comfortable shooting the ball. I hope that comfortable feeling continues, because the defense is still playing pretty good."Brandon Valley coach Brent Deckert said that for as good as Lincoln was in the first half, he believed the Pats were even tougher in the second half.By the numbers, Deckert was spot-on in his assessment as the Patriots held the Lynx to 27 percent (7-for-26) shooting from the field over the final two quarters and outscored Brandon Valley 18-2 in the paint over the same span.(2 of 2)"I wish we could play them again because they're good," Deckert said. "You've got to be at your best to play them, and with the way we rebounded, we didn't deserve to win."
Poor shot selection was also a significant setback for the Lynx, who were led by 12 points from Ben Schultz, nine from Brock Wickett and eight from Tyler Trevino. "It was almost a race for our guys to see which one could put up the quickest, worst shot," said Deckert, whose team travels to Huron next Thursday."We'd have a better Christmas had we won the game, but I'll feel better in March if we win then."As for Lincoln, home wins could be hard to come by as the Patriots play eight of their next nine games on the road, beginning with a Jan. 7 tilt at Spearfish."It doesn't matter," Halseth said of the Pats' schedule, which only includes five more home games. "It's good to be 3-1 right now going into the break and to be able to come back with fresh legs."BRANDON VALLEY (1-2)Tyler Trevino 3 0-0 8, Sam Rall 0 0-0 0, Isaac Hanson 0 0-0 0, Ben Schultz 5 1-3 12, Ben Kramer 2 1-4 5, Dylan Rock 1 3-4 5, Mack Driscoll 0 0-0 0, Kyle Peterson 0 0-0 0, Chase Marso 0 0-0 0, Brock Wickett 3 2-2 9, Nate Peterson 1 0-0 3, Ben Richardson 0 2-2 2. Totals 15 9-15 44.LINCOLN (3-1)Trey Naasz 3 3-6 10, Scott Mulder 3 2-3 8, Will Hieber 6 2-2 17, Ty Jaros 1 2-2 4, Trent Wilcoxon 1 0-0 2, Alex Hannemann 0 0-0 0, Matt Vander Woude 2 4-4 8, Dylan Peterson 2 0-0 4, Nick Goeman 5 -01 10, Andrew Peterson 0 0-0 0, Kade Hansen 0 3-5 3, Patrick Leach 0 0-0 0, Brett Bergstrom 0 0-0 0, Creighton Smith 1 0-0 2. Totals 24 16-23 68.Brandon Valley 9 19 28 44Lincoln 15 32 47 683-pointers - BV 5 (Trevino 2), LHS 4 (Hieber 3). Rebounds - BV 26 (Rall, Kramer 5), LHS 43 (Naasz 8). Fouls - BV 15, LHS 17. Assists - BV 10 (Wickett 4), LHS 15 (Wilcoxon 5). Steals - BV 5 (Wickett 2), LHS

description.hltext_display: 新车险费率浮动 去年无赔款今年两次理赔优惠不变
description.content:
京报网讯(记者傅洋)《2011年度北京地区机动车商业保险费率浮动档次升降方案》今天公布，明年1月1日起实施。按照《方案》，如果2009年没有理赔记录、2010年发生1至2次保险理赔的车辆，明年投保商业车险时，保费优惠幅度不升不降。
《方案》规定：凡2009年、2010年连续两年都在北京市投保商业车险的机动车辆，2009年度没有保险理赔记录，但在2010年度发生了1至2次保险理赔，且累计赔款金额小于当年所缴纳的保费金额，该车辆在2011年继续投保商业车险时，“无赔款优待及上年赔款记录”系数仍执行2010年度的系数，即“不升不降”。其余情况，仍按《北京地区机动车商业保险费率浮动方案》执行。
例如，某车2009年商业车险无理赔记录；2010年投保时无赔款优待系数为0.85，与其他系数累乘后总浮动系数为0.6885，缴纳保费为3600元；在2010年出险1次，赔款金额2100元。按照原方案，2011年该车应该浮动0.9，而按照今天公布的新方案，该车主仍享受0.85的优惠。
北京保险行业协会产险部主任李枫介绍，自车险浮动费率执行以来，2010年续保客户中65%的车主能享受到保险优惠。符合2010年发生一两次赔款且明年能享受不升不降的客户约占10%左右。
据介绍，2010年商业车险出险比2009年进一步降低，但交强险理赔数据却出现上升。北京保监局产险处介绍，这是因为浮动费率实施前，许多人把双方事故拆成单方事故，而浮动费率优惠实施以来，双方事故中更多车主怕涨保费不愿承担单方责任。
保险行业协会介绍，今后车辆投保优惠还会考虑随人随车因素。由于升降问题比较复杂，费率档次涉及公平性、合理性。保险行业协会将在网站开辟专栏，广泛征集社会各界意见、建议。
另据记者了解，限行违规车主将不再享受限行保费优惠政策，但与商业车险浮动无关。

description.hltext_display: 中国企业社会责任榜揭晓 A.O.史密斯获殊荣
description.content:
历时近6个月，以“责任引领未来?仁商”为年度主题的“2010第一财经?中国企业社会责任榜”12月8日揭晓。在此次上榜的企业中，A.O.史密斯和微软、梅赛德斯-奔驰、诺基亚、通用汽车等跨国公司一道获得了杰出企业奖，此次榜上有名，无形之中彰显出了A.O.史密斯在创新、环保、社会责任等方面的突出实力。
企业社会责任榜丁威总裁（左三）在领奖台
A.O.史密斯、微软、奔驰、诺基亚榜上有名
每一个时代都有自己的主题。在2010年，中国企业界最重要的主题，与“和谐劳动关系”、“体面劳动”、“幸福、尊严与公正”等关键词相关。
为了顺应这一潮流，作为中国最大的财经媒体群，第一财经・中国企业社会责任榜特别以“责任引领未来?仁商”为年度主题，倡导仁爱天下的和谐商道，寻找中国“仁商” ，探求伟大企业之路。
据了解，中国企业社会责任榜从“仁之厚”、“仁之爱”、“仁之道”、“仁之济”、“仁之信”所对应的和谐关系绩效、员工关怀绩效、社会公益绩效和经济责任绩效等不同的维度进行考量。通过层层选拔， A.O.史密斯不负众望，和微软、梅赛德斯-奔驰、诺基亚、大众汽车、通用汽车等19家知名公司一起突出重围，荣获了杰出企业奖这一最高荣誉。
企业社会责任榜领奖现场
身为“百年老店” 价值观有非凡凝聚力
这一奖项的获得，无疑是对A.O.史密斯在社会责任方面的极度认可。的确，作为一名具有百年历史的热水专家，A.O.史密斯始终将消费者的需求放在首位。不仅通过科技创新将先进技术融于产品，更融入了老百姓的生活，为中国消费者提供出超值、环保的热水器产品。
光是翻开A.O.史密斯的产品名录，就能看出其永远把消费者需求放在首位、并不断坚持创新的产品理念――带一氧化碳安全防护系统的燃气热水器、可“阳台安装”的太阳能电热水器、“省电一半”的电热水等新品层出不穷，不仅给中国消费者带来一次又一次的惊喜，而且让A.O.史密斯始终走在了热水器领域的最前端。
“如果说我们的成功秘诀是什么，就是因为有一个非常有凝聚力的价值观体系。”，A.O.史密斯全球副总裁兼中国区总裁丁威表示，作为一家成熟的企业，A.O.史密斯136年积累下来的价值观不容忽视。“可将其总结为四个满意，就是让股东满意、客户满意、员工满意和社会满意。”
A.O.史密斯获杰出大奖
以人为本 用创新环保引领科技
企业肩负着一定的社会责任，并将其融入到企业核心业务，融入到公司战略。这一点说起来容易做起来难。不过，能和多家跨国企业一起获得杰出企业奖，A.O.史密斯的功力不可小觑。
就在前不久刚刚落幕的上海世博会上，A.O.史密斯作为美国馆热水设备官方指定供应商，为23个世博场馆提供了全方位的热水解决方案，将近30个型号的商用燃气及电热水器、热水炉在世博会上大显身手。丁威认为，超前的设计理念、过硬的质量，使得A.O.史密斯热水器为世博所青睐。“而打造绿色低碳的节能产品，一直是A.O.史密斯研发的原动力。”
据悉，作为一家拥有136年历史的全球性企业，A.O.史密斯公司始终坚持主推高品质的产品和服务。自1998年进入中国市场以来，一直以创新产品赢得中国家庭的信赖。

description.hltext_display: 怀孕第九个月应该吃什么好？
description.content:
军后勤医院妇科，怀孕
广州空军后勤医院妇科专家推出怀孕第九个月时有哪些护胎保胎食谱
[原料]
河鳗750克，紫菜5张，鸡蛋3个，小葱5根，姜末、黄酒、盐、味精、淀粉、麻油各适量。
[做法]
①河鳗洗净，用刀沿脊背剖开，剔去背骨，去皮，除去筋、刺，用刀斩成细泥，放入碗内，加姜末、黄酒、精盐、味精、鸡蛋清（1个）、冷水1 00克，用力搅拌，拌上劲后，再拌以淀粉、麻油，即咸鱼泥。
②鸡蛋敲入碗内，加淀粉、盐，用筷子打匀，在锅内分别摊成5张蛋皮待用。
⑥砧板上摊开一张紫菜，覆上一层蛋皮，再抹上一层鱼泥，中间放入一根小葱，顺次卷拢。依上述方法，做成5条，放入蒸笼，用旺火蒸1 0分钟，取出冷却后，切成斜刀块即成。
[特点]
味鲜滑嫩，滋养佳品。
鱼肉馄饨
[原料]
净鱼肉1 25克，猪肉馅75克，绿叶菜50克，绍酒5克，葱花5克，干淀粉50克，味精0.5克，精盐2克，熟鸡油5克。
[做法]
①将鱼肉剁成泥，加精盐0.5克拌和，做成1 8个鱼丸；砧板上放干淀粉，把鱼丸放在干淀粉里逐个滚动，使鱼丸渗入干淀粉后有黏性，然后用擀面杖做成直径7厘米左右的薄片，即成鱼肉馄饨皮。
②将猪肉馅做成18个馅心，用鱼肉馄饨皮卷好捏牢。
③旺火烧锅，放入清水100克烧沸，下馄饨，用筷子轻搅，以免黏结，用小火烧到馄饨浮土水面5分钟左右，即可捞出。
④在汤中加精盐和绍酒，烧沸后放入绿叶菜（韭菜、香菜均可），放入味精，倒入盛有馄饨的碗中，撒葱花，淋鸡油即可食用。
[特点]
皮白肉红，质地滑嫩，鲜香可口。
怀孕第九个月应该吃什么好？醋溜白菜
[原料]
莲花白750克，菜油50克，酱油1 0克，醋2.5克，水淀粉50克，盐、味精少许。
[做法]
①莲花白（卷心白也可）除去老叶和梗，洗后切成约4厘米见方的片，加盐和匀腌约1分钟。
②用碗将酱油、盐、醋、水淀粉等调成滋汁。
⑥炒锅置火上烧热，下菜油烧至七成熟时，下莲花白炒熟，加汤(75克)，烹下滋汁，将汁收浓起锅。
[特点]
味鲜而烫，醋味突出，宜于下饭。
怀孕第九个月应该吃什么好？黄鱼羹
[原料]
黄鱼500克，精肉100克，韭菜50克，鸡蛋1个，酱油、料酒、味精、姜片、姜末、醋、淀粉各少许，食油100克，熟油50克。
[做法]
①黄鱼去头、尾、骨头，留皮用清水洗净，放入盘内，上放姜片、料酒少许，上笼蒸10分钟，取出再理净小骨，拔碎备用；精肉切成丝。
②锅烧热，放入食油100克，肉丝下锅煸炒，加入料酒、酱油，即将鱼肉下锅，加汤水1碗，滚起后加入醋、淀粉，最后放打散的鸡蛋、韭菜、姜末，加上熟油50克，出锅即成。
[特点]
此菜具有蟹肉的味道。
广州后勤医院妇科微创诊疗中心咨询电话：020―83546536
【进入广州空军后勤部医院妇科中心专题>>】

description.hltext_display: 区县45万名公费医疗将并入医保 明年1月1日起实施
description.content:
京报网讯(记者代丽丽)从明年1月1日开始，全市16个区县的约45万名公费医疗人员将统一并入职工基本医疗保险制度，使用社保卡看病交费。
据了解，公费医疗虽然“看上去很美”，但实际上，它也存在着不能报销门诊费、定点医院只有一两家、垫付资金负担重、报销周期长、没法用社保卡等弊端。所以在一些享受公费医疗的单位当中，要求将公费医疗转为医保的呼声很高。
在平谷、海淀、西城等区县试点一年的基础上，全市统一性的区县公费医疗改革指导意见已于今年年中下发，由各区县结合实际情况制定各自的改革方案。目前，已有通州、朝阳、大兴等多个区县制定了改革方案。
全市区县公费医疗改革指导意见
1.采取基本医疗保险和补充保险相结合的方式，公费医疗人员参加基本医疗保险的同时参加大额医疗互助，并建立单位补充医疗保险。
2.公费医疗人员参加基本医疗保险后，按规定缴纳基本医疗保险统筹基金和大额互助资金，并享受相关医疗保障待遇。
3.各区县在参加基本医疗保险的同时，建立单位补充医疗保险，在全市统一政策出台前，各区县标准暂自行制定。
4.在工伤保险、生育保险未将享受单位补充医疗保险人员纳入保障范围前，享受单位补充医疗保险人员发生的工(公)伤、生育费用由单位补充医疗保险支付。
5.各区县9月底前确定公费医疗向基本医疗保险并轨的实施方案，年底前全面完成区县属公费医疗向职工基本医疗保险并轨的各项准备工作，2011年1月1日实现制度平稳启动。

description.hltext_display: 九区试点交通事故人民调解 调解工作全部免费
description.content:
文章来源：北京日报
网络编辑:刘洁
京报网讯（记者侯莎莎）今后，发生人员伤亡的交通事故，如双方对民事赔偿有争议，可以申请由道路交通事故人民调解委员会进行调解。昨天，海淀等九个区作为第一批试点单位，在辖区交通支队正式挂牌成立道路交通事故人民调解委员会。调解工作全部免费。
“我修车期间，天天打车上下班，这费用你得掏了吧？”“我只管你走保险修车，凭什么打车钱我给你报销啊？”昨天，在海淀区道路交通事故人民调解委员会，记者看到了两位来申请调解的车主。调解员孙先明和同事，一人劝一边儿，“按惯例，修车期间，您的交通费用只能按照乘坐公交车的花销报，除非是看病需要。”
海淀区道路交通事故人民调解委员会设有5名人民调解员，他们都从事过人民调解工作，有的还曾是法官、检察官、律师，在上岗前都经过了相关业务培训，每次聘期3年，每年进行考核。孙先明曾是名律师，现在是专职人民调解员，对于调解纠纷，他有自己的一套办法：“首先就是背靠背，分别了解双方当事人的真实意图，看看分歧有多大。其次就是说话不说满，以倾听为主。”
市交管局事故处负责人介绍，交通事故的赔偿问题历来都很棘手，双方当事人对事故赔偿数额很难达成一致。以往，在这种情况下，当事人只有向公安机关申请调解或向人民法院提起民事诉讼。以海淀区为例，每年该区都会有近千起此类交通事故诉至法院，而由于必须调取大量证据以及审判资源有限等原因，起诉、开庭、宣判，往往需要漫长的过程。
有了道路交通事故人民调解委员会后，当事人又多了一种解决问题的途径。遇到民事赔偿纠纷时，当事人可到人民调解委员会进行申请，由委员会指定调解员，也可由当事人选择一名或多名调解员。调解应在30天内解决。30天内不能达成协议的，委员会将出具《道路交通事故人民调解终止告知书》。调解成功的，签署协议书。协议书具有法律约束力，调解委员会会对协议履行情况进行监督。
人民调解的原则是要双方当事人自愿，而且即使签署了协议，仍会维护当事人的诉讼权利。因此，当履行发生争议时，当事人可起诉至法院。另外，达成协议后，双方如果认为有必要，可在30天内向人民法院申请司法确认，确认后，一方拒绝履行协议的，另一方可申请法院强制执行。
目前，交通事故人民调解工作在海淀、朝阳、丰台、房山、通州、昌平、大兴、顺义、怀柔九区试点，均设在辖区交通支队。明年市交管局和市司法局、市保监局还将进一步加大对人民调解工作的推进力度，明年上半年将完成全市其他区、县道路交通事故人民调解委员会的建设工作。

description.hltext_display: 性生活后私处出血就是有宫颈糜烂吗？
description.content:
军后勤医院妇科，宫颈糜烂，宫颈糜烂症状，宫颈糜烂治疗
宫颈糜烂症状
有一些女性患有阴道炎也会有白带带血的情况，不过除此之外，宫颈糜烂患者也会有类似的情况出线。因为患有宫颈糜烂的女性是会出现阴道不规则出血或是性生活接触性出血的，这种现象是宫颈糜烂引起的，由于覆盖面的新生上皮很薄，能看到下方的血管和红色组织。
性生活时阴茎和宫颈有直接的接触，会导致宫颈的损伤，这样就会出现少量血液，或是白带伴有血丝等情况。如果出血量很大，还会出现尿急、尿频等现象。
除此之外，宫颈糜烂的主要症状为白带增多，有的甚至是唯一症状。由于病原体的不同，以及糜烂的范围及程度的差异，白带的性状也有所不同。如主要是柱状上皮增生引起的糜烂，炎症感染不明显，白带则主要为透明黏液;如宫颈糜烂伴有明显的炎症感染，白带则呈黄色脓性、黏稠状。糜烂面积较小或为病变累及较浅的单纯性糜烂，白带量可能较少;如果病变累及较深、面积较大的重度糜烂，则白带量较多，偶尔也可能带少量血丝或血液。
广州空军后勤医院妇科专家建议：以上就是关于“性生活后私处出血就是有宫颈糜烂吗”的相关健康问题，如果还有不了解的，请点击在线妇科专家。专家建议女性如果性生活后私处出血一定要去正规的医院进行检查，最好是不要拖延时间哦！
广州后勤医院妇科微创诊疗中心咨询电话：020―83546536
【进入广州空军后勤部医院妇科中心专题>>】

description.hltext_display: 唐家岭提前12天完成旧村腾退 村民妥善周转安置
description.content:
文章来源：北京日报
网络编辑:刘洁
京报网讯(记者王海燕 杨晓斌)一度喧闹、嘈杂的唐家岭现已渐归于平静。昨天，记者从唐家岭地区整体改造指挥部了解到，经过150天的努力，唐家岭旧村已经于12月18日完成旧村腾退，比预定日期提前了12天。
昨天，唐家岭旧村里一派寂静。村中鳞次栉比的饭店、服装店、住宅楼，除个别建筑仍在拆除外，绝大多数已被夷为平地。
“腾退工作从今年7月18日正式开始，到12月18日结束，用了整整5个月时间。” 唐家岭地区整体改造指挥部工作人员表示，相比于原计划的“年底结束”，腾退提前12天完成，“过程还比较顺利。”
据了解，此次腾退，唐家岭村共腾出1153个旧村宅基地院落，拆除建筑140余万平方米。
海淀区西北旺镇有关负责人介绍，为鼓励村民尽早搬迁，唐家岭村委会设立了3个月的奖励期。“93%村民都在奖励期内签订了腾退协议。”对于剩余7%的村民，拆迁工作组分成5个小分队，分片包户，根据各户情况，逐个拿出解决方案。曾经备受媒体关注的7层违建――“董家大院”就在工作组人员上百次的登门沟通之后，于上个月顺利完成腾退。
由于靠近中关村软件园、航天城等科技园区，唐家岭村曾聚集了大量外来人口，高峰时达到四五万人。如今，流动人口已经全部疏散。4816名村民每人每月享受900元租房补贴，自行到村外周转安置。考虑到村内有20多户家庭因为老人行动不便或者家人有残疾，找周转房比较困难，村委会特地腾出集体所有的一栋二层小楼，暂不拆除，作为这部分家庭的周转房使用，将来村民搬进新居后，再将小楼拆除。
与旧村拆除同步，唐家岭新村也在紧锣密鼓的建设中。据了解，新村安置房位于航天城南侧，总面积35万平方米，小区内配建有购物街、文化广场、小学、幼儿园等公建设施，预计2012年上半年即可入住。
除安置房外，唐家岭还将建设10万平方米的村集体土地租赁房，以满足地区外来人口的住房需求。

description.hltext_display: Tulospalkkiot piti maksaa laittomasta lakosta
description.content:
Ke 10:14 (STT) | Päivitetty: Ke 10:15
Työnantaja ei olisi saanut jättää tulospalkkioita maksamatta laittomaan työtaisteluun osallistuneille, katsoo korkein oikeus. Se määräsi Stora Enson Inkeroisten tehtaan maksamaan tulospalkkiot noin kolmellekymmenelle vuonna 2006 lakkoilleelle työntekijälle.
Yhtiö oli kirjannut tulospalkkiojärjestelmään ehdon, jonka mukaan laittoman työtaistelun aiheuttamat menetykset vähennettiin siihen osallistuneiden tulospalkkioista. Korkeimman oikeuden mukaan yhtiö pyrki näin laittomasti rajoittamaan työntekijöiden yhdistymisvapautta.

description.hltext_display: 高中生助学金资助范围扩大 农村贫困生年补助600元
description.content:
文章来源：北京日报
网络编辑:刘洁
昨天，市教委公布了新制定的《北京市普通高中国家助学金管理制度》。明年春季开学起，高中生助学金资助范围有所扩大，本市10个远郊区县贫困地区农村户籍高中生，每人每年可享受600元补助。
烈士子女孤儿纳入资助
据了解，2005年颁布的旧规中，助学金只分为两档：低保家庭学生可以享受甲等奖学金；家庭情况略高于低保家庭水平的学生可享受乙等奖学金。
新发布的《北京市普通高中国家助学金管理制度》规定，持有《北京市城市(农村)居民最低社会保障领取证》、《北京市城市居民生活困难补助金领取证》和《北京市低收入家庭救助证》的城乡低保家庭经济困难学生以及革命烈士子女、孤儿等全部纳入资助范围。不过，民办高中学生不在资助之列。
资助金比五年前增一倍
按照新规定，本市对高中生的资助金额比五年前大幅提高，其中，甲等与乙等助学金金额都比五年前增加了一倍。
根据新规，获得甲等国家助学金的学生每年可享受2000元补助，同时免交学费和住宿费；获得乙等国家助学金的学生每年可享受1200元补助，同时学费和住宿费均减免50%；获得丙等国家助学金的学生每年可享受600元的补助，同时学费和住宿费均减免50%。
政策同时规定，家庭无经济来源的革命烈士子女、孤儿，国家助学金每年多补助400元；家庭发生临时经济困难的学生减免学费。
资助等级两档变三档
2005年实施的旧规中，对享受乙等助学金的低收入家庭学生的界定有些模糊不清，“家庭条件略高于低保家庭的”就被算作低收入家庭。此次发布的新规明确了低收入家庭学生的界定条件，即持有《北京市低收入家庭救助证》的学生，才能享受乙等助学金。
此外，新规定细化了资助等级，将以前实行甲、乙两个档次调整为甲、乙、丙三个档次，同时，将10个远郊区县贫困地区农村户籍学生单独作为一类资助群体，为他们设立了丙等助学金。
助学金通过银行卡发放
根据规定，符合条件的学生可向学校提出申请，申请人需进行公示。
学校将为每位受助学生办理银行储蓄卡，按学期将国家助学金直接发放到受助学生个人，一律不得以实物或服务等方式，抵顶或扣减国家助学金。为学生办理银行储蓄卡，不得向学生收取卡费或押金等费用，也不得从学生享受的国家助学金中抵扣。记者 贾晓燕

description.hltext_display: MU va être vendu
description.content: Sur son site internet, The Sun affirme ce mercredi que Manchester United va être vendu et certainement à la famille royale du Qatar. « Ce n'est pas un secret. La famille Glazer va vendre » déclare au journal, Mike Edelson, directeur exécutif de Old Trafford. Arrivé à la tête de MU il y a 5 ans et demi pour 790 millions de livres sterling, Malcolm Glazer devrait se séparer des Red Devils pour 1,5 milliards de livres sterling. Une plus-value qui servira aussi à éponger les dettes du club (on parle de 500 millions de livres). Le Qatar a obtenu l'organisation de la Coupe du monde 2022 et la famille royale est récemment devenue le premier sponsor du FC Barcelone.

description.hltext_display: 宫颈糜烂的症状有性生活过后私处出血吗？
description.content:
军后勤医院妇科，宫颈糜烂的症状
网友问：我之前在网上曾经看过两下宫颈糜烂的症状，但是我不是很在意，最近我和老公性生活过后私处出血，我想问下这是不是宫颈糜烂的症状之一呢？宫颈糜烂的症状有这个性生活过后私处出血的症状吗？
广州空军后勤医院妇科专家：有一些女性患有阴道炎也会有白带带血的情况，不过除此之外，宫颈糜烂患者也会有类似的情况出现。
因为患有宫颈糜烂的女性是会出现阴道不规则出血或是性生活接触性出血的，这种现象是宫颈糜烂引起的，由于覆盖面的新生上皮很薄，能看到下方的血管和红色组织。
广州空军后勤医院妇科专家还称：性生活时阴茎和宫颈有直接的接触，会导致宫颈的损伤，这样就会出现少量血液，或是白带伴有血丝等情况。如果出血量很大，还会出现尿急、尿频等现象。
宫颈糜烂的症状除此之外，宫颈糜烂的主要症状为白带增多，有的甚至是唯一症状。由于病原体的不同，以及糜烂的范围及程度的差异，白带的性状也有所不同。如主要是柱状上皮增生引起的糜烂，炎症感染不明显，白带则主要为透明黏液;如宫颈糜烂伴有明显的炎症感染，白带则呈黄色脓性、黏稠状。糜烂面积较小或为病变累及较浅的单纯性糜烂，白带量可能较少;如果病变累及较深、面积较大的重度糜烂，则白带量较多，偶尔也可能带少量血丝或血液。
广州空军后勤医院的纳米银宫颈细胞DNA修复术全称为美国BMTM纳米银宫颈细胞DNA修复术。纳米银宫颈细胞DNA修复仪因为是美国BMTM公司首个研制并生产，因此又被简称为纳米银宫颈细胞DNA修复术或者纳米银DNA修复术。纳米银宫颈细胞DNA修复仪是专业用于临床无创性消除宫颈糜烂、宫颈炎及宫颈癌等疾病诊疗的大型医疗设备。纳米银宫颈细胞DNA修复仪涉及医学、生物医学工程、基因学、自动化控制、计算机、精密机械制造等多项技术，其临床应用取得显著疗效。
纳米银宫颈细胞DNA修复术优势特点：
1. 可通过宫颈细胞DNA分析仪来观察宫颈糜烂或宫颈炎症以及宫颈癌的大小、部位、形态以及与邻近组织器官的关系，确定修复范围。
2、一次性彻底根治宫颈炎症和肿瘤，不伤害宫颈周围的正常组织，治疗后还可通过宫颈细胞DNA分析仪进行复查，明了治疗效果。
2. 无创治疗，无辐射、无副作用、保宫不影响生育，提升患者生存质量;
3. 纳米银的超强杀菌能力和深入细胞的修复能力，可以使受损细胞得到修复，并且再生健康新细胞，让宫颈恢复到完好无损。
4. 治疗过程短，修复过程短，无痛不流血，还可以对晚期宫颈癌也可行姑息治疗(例如止痛)。
广州空军后勤医院妇科专家建议：以上就是关于“宫颈糜烂的症状有性生活过后私处出血吗”的相关健康问题，专家建议女性如果性生活后私处出血一定要去正规的医院进行检查，最好是不要拖延时间哦！如果还有不了解的，请点击在线妇科专家。
广州后勤医院妇科微创诊疗中心咨询电话：020―83546536
