description.hltext_display: Braaten forlenger
description.content:
Daniel Braaten som i det siste også har vært med på det norske landslaget har forlenget avtalen med Toulouse fram til sommeren 2013.
28-åringen er toppscorer for klubben som spiller den siste kampen i år borte mot Valenciennes onsdag.
– Det var interesse både fra England og andre franske klubber, men for Daniel er dette det beste alternativet og vi har fått en løsning vi er svært tilfreds med, sier Braatens agent Stig Lillejord til TV 2 Sporten.
Braaten kom til Toulouse sommeren 2008 etter et mislykket i Bolton i engelsk eliteserie. Den tidligere Skeid- og RBK-spilleren har hatt tillit og blomstret i den franske klubben. (ANB-NTB)

description.hltext_display: Department of Defense releases ’11 BAH rates
description.content:
The Department of Defense has released the 2011 Basic Allowance for Housing (BAH) rates, which take effect Jan. 1. While overall rates will decrease an average of 0.59 percent because of the individual rate protection provision, the average change service members will see is a 1.1 percent increase.
Individual rate protection ensures that individual members already assigned to a given location will not see their BAH rate decrease, though they will receive the increase if the rate goes up. This assures that members who have made long-term commitments in the form of a lease or contract are not penalized if the area's housing costs decrease. Any decreases only apply to members newly reporting to a location.
A typical junior enlisted member with dependents will find his/her BAH about $39 per month higher than last year, while a senior non-commissioned officer with dependents will receive about the same amount as last year.
Three components are included in the BAH computation: median current market rent; average utilities (including electricity, heat, and water/sewer) and average renter's insurance.
Total housing costs are calculated for six housing profiles (based on dwelling type and number of bedrooms) in each military housing area. BAH rates are then calculated for each pay grade, both with and without dependents. An estimated $19 billion will be paid to more than 1 million service members in 2011.
For more information on BAH, go to https://www.defensetravel.dod.mil/site/bah.cfm .

description.hltext_display: England & Russia Expel Diplomats in Espionage Spat
description.content:
Britain reportedly expelled a Russian diplomat suspected of spying on Tuesday and Russia responded by expelling a Briton in the latest skirmish in a long-running spat over espionage.
British Foreign Secretary William Hague said his government had asked the Russian Embassy in London to withdraw a staff member on December 10 "in response to clear evidence of activities by the Russian intelligence services against UK interests." Russia, in return, expelled a diplomat from the British Embassy in Moscow.

event_or_fact.property: his government had asked the Russian Embassy in London to withdraw a staff member on December 10 "in response to clear evidence of activities by the Russian intelligence services against UK interests.

description.hltext_display: Enthusiart
description.content:
74-76 Oxford Street, Darlinghurst, NSW, 2010
Costa
It’s time to expose your art to the industry! District 01 is pleased to introduce, ! A brand new exhibition for anyone who wishes to showcase their hobby at the District 01 gallery, Darlinghurst beginning in 2011!
We are calling out to all enthusiartists - sculptors, freehand drawers, painters and photographers, the chance to submit a maximum of 5 artworks (.jpgs no larger than 1000 pixels) and the following information of each to info@district01.com.au
- Your name
- Title of work
- Year you created it
- Dimensions
- Type (framed/unframed if relevant)
- Price
Once we have received your submission, we will evaluate all works and contact you directly outlining the details of the exhibition which will take place early 2011!
Submissions close Monday January 31st, 2011

description.hltext_display: Skijaška avantura Tonyja Cetinskog u Austriji
description.content: Strastveni skijaš Tony Cetinski, kojeg dijeli tek jedan ispit do diplo­me instruktora skijanja, proveo je tjedan dana u Austriji. Naime, početkom siječnja popularni pjevač planira se ponovno vratiti na snjež­ne staze, ali sa svojom cijelom obitelji, kada će kćerkicu Piju prvi put staviti na skije. To će zacijelo biti nezaboravna pustolovina za mamu Ivanu Nobilo [...]

description.hltext_display: Fidel (coração) Obama
description.content:
Colunista da BBC Brasil
Consta que o grafite vem se reproduzindo nas paredes de Cuba e dos Estados Unidos. Conhecemos demais. Eu (coraçãozinho) Tal Coisa.
Há talvez um excesso de paz na Terra aos homens de boa – e também de má – vontade.
Em Cuba, e já se espalha pela América Latina, Yo (corazonzito) Obama.
E seu reverso ou consequência vem sofrendo campanha por norte-americanos que não desejam a extradição ou a morte do assanhado antípoda Julian Assange: I (little heart) Fidel.
Quem te viu e quem te vê, hein, Fidel? Aguentou firme invasão de Kennedy, charutos explosivos da CIA, viu passarem, ou melhor desfilarem desta para melhor (possivelmente pior), 10 presidentes dos Estados Unidos. Unidos, sejamos claros, em desejar, se não tramar, o assassinato do jefe máximo cubano, ora contando 84 anitos: o equivalente, mais ou menos, de generais de pijamas.
Ao que parece, há em Havana um destacamento militar encarregado de, lá pelas 11 da manhã, botar Fidel numa cadeirinha de lona e deixá-lo exposto aos saudáveis raios da ilha caribenha.
Um segundo destacamento, por volta de 1 da tarde, recolhe-o – limpa a babinha que escorreu do canto esquerdo da boca desenhando um mapa da ilha na gola do pijama, e o leva para desfrutar dos prazeres da culinária cubana. Sopinha de feijão preto e broinha de fubá El Mimoso é sua refeição predileta.
Depois, uma siesta, que ninguém nessa idade é de ferro, mesmo tendo passado pelos rigores de Sierra Maestra.
Lá vai o grande Fidel a caminho da rede cantando os poucos compassos que, ao longo de uma vida, conseguiu decorar de Guantanamera. Não é nenhum Pete Seeger mas dá, aqui e ali, umas notinhas quase, quase afinadas. No fundo, no fundo, Fidel preferia ouvir Bola de Nieve cantando Drume Negrita.
À espera do sono benévolo da tarde quente e preguiçosa de Havana, um soldado de voz macia e musical lê para ele uma seleção especial dos noticiários nacional e internacional especialmente preparada para ele por equivalentes ao que há de melhor em mestres-cucas cubanos.
Corre, à boca pequena, e grande também, que cada vez que é mencionado o nome de Barack Obama, Fidel abre os olhões sonolentos e, em sua melhor dicção cubana, pergunta e pede, “Cumequié? Obama? Lê de novo. Caprichando,”
É o que afirmam serviços de inteligência locais e também os sediados em Little Havana, em Miami, estado da Flórida, EUA.
Os jornais estão dando.
Assange, ora muito vedete, aguarda pressuroso mais novidades para poder vazar. (Assange tem a alma das colunistas de mexericos dos tablóides.)
Tudo indica que a idade não é motivo para Fidel se aposentar das folganças amorosas. Uma notícia de última hora, divulgada ainda agorinha pela WikiLeaks, revela que, por telegramas, a diplomacia do Tio Sam está prestes a parir uma abóbora de tão preocupada.
Estavam eles, os diplomatas americanos, a divulgar, também lá de suas siestas, a mais recente diatribe do líder máximo, decano dos ditadores. De repente, a zebra.
Fidel, em sua empreitada autobiográfica-jornalística, a Reflexiones del Compañero Fidel, elogiando Obama. Elogiando mesmo.
Uma loucura de azeitonas no empadão americano.
E fazendo apologias para quem o visita (só entre as 4 e 6 da tarde) das qualidades ímpares e pares do presidente americano.
O nobelizado líder pacífico americano (está ultimando a venda recorde de 96 bilhões de dólares em armamentos para a Arábia Saudita), em 9 de junho, no Cairo, discursou sobre as relações entre seu país e os muçulmanos.
Fidel não teve dúvida: enviou uma mensagem congratulatória de 3.500 palavras, média que ele reserva apenas para os cartões de Natal e Feliz Ano Novo.
Um diplomata americano, anônimo nesta coluna ao menos (não vazamos), foi longe e disse que assim não dava pé, virara obsessão. Sem erro de ortografia e concordância, o que é raro para os americanos nomeados embaixadores, já que não são de carreira mas apenas ricos contribuintes para campanhas eleitorais.
“Grande comunicador!”, dizia Fidel, durante todo aquele junho, de sua cadeirinha de lona exposta ao sol, e a guarda cuidava de que nenhum passante o ouvisse. “Grande comunicador!”, repetia Fidel, como se referindo a um Chacrinha ou Sílvio Santos.
Nada mais dissemelhante do que o “bêbado homicida” que, até outro dia mesmo – e parece que foi ontem – reservava para George W. Bush.
Apesar de não ter aprovado de todo o desempenho de Obama na conferência sobre mudanças climáticas em Copenhague (chamou-o de “beirando o demagogo”), Fidel Castro ainda não pune com prisão ou fuzilamento quem espalhar o grafite em questão, o do coraçãozinho, pelos muros e postes da cidade.
Línguas maldosas chegam a dizer que o próprio Fidel Castro rabisca os grafites num caderninho de capa azul onde anota pensamentos para suas “reflexiones” e faz caricaturas de inimigos que já se foram.

description.hltext_display: Firefighters mopping up blaze in mobile home
description.content:
Hot-spots in the debris from a mobile home fire in South Anchorage have several units from the Anchorage Fire Department still at the scene tonight.
Firefighters put out most of the blaze near Toloff Street and Abbott Road that started just after 3 p.m.
One person in the home was injured in the blaze and taken to a hospital, fire department spokeswoman Sue Rodman said. The extent of the person's injuries was not immediately known, she said.
Two engines, a battalion chief and a medic responded, Rodman said.

description.hltext_display: Friskmelder seg selv
description.content:
Kristian Kjelling kommer med gode nyheter til landslagssjef Robert Hedin foran VM i januar.
Tips ein venn på e-post:
Kommentaren din
Del på nettet:
Kjelling har slitt med en strekkskade i magemuskulaturen og det har gjort at han verken kunne løpe eller skyte skikkelig. En planlagt operasjon er tidligere blitt utsatt til etter VM.
– Med magen går det egentlig ganske fint. Det er godt å være friskmeldt og føle at det er i orden. Nå har jeg en kamp igjen med Aalborg før VM–oppholdet. Så skal jeg brukte tiden fram VM med å komme opp igjen til det fysiske nivået jeg var, sa Kjelling til TV 2 Sporten.
Norge innleder VM i Sverige med kamp mot Japan i Norrköping 14. januar. Ungarn, Østerrike, Brasil og Island de andre norske motstanderne i gruppespillet. (ANB-NTB)

description.hltext_display: Ashton Kutcher moet getuigen in moordzaak ex-vriendin
description.content: 22/12/10, 08u34 � afp Ashton Kutcher zal in de rechtbank vragen moeten beantwoorden over zijn vermoorde ex-vriendin. Seriemoordenaar Michael Gargiulo staat terecht wegens de moord op meerdere vrouwen, waaronder Ashtons ex Ashley Ellerin. Zij kwam negen jaar geleden op gruwelijke wijze door 35 messteken om het leven, schrijft De Telegraaf. Ashton miste op de avond dat ze werd vermoord zijn afspraak met Ashley. De acteur heeft toen nog door het raam van haar huis gekeken. Hij had echter niet in de gaten dat de plas rode wijn eigenlijk het bloed van zijn ex was. De acteur nam aan dat Ashley uit woede een fles wijn had stukgeslagen en is toen naar huis teruggekeerd. De moordenaar was een bekende in de buurt. Hij zou ook twee andere vrouwen hebben vermoord. (adv)

description.hltext_display: New START boon for Y-12
description.content:
Plant stands to gain if Senate passes treaty as expected
Knoxville News Sentinel
Atomic City Underground
OAK RIDGE - The New START Treaty could prove to be a security blanket for the Y-12 nuclear weapons plant.
Ratification of the hotly debated nuclear arms-reduction treaty is now considered a virtual certainty, with a vote by the full Senate expected as early as today, and the Oak Ridge plant stands to benefit.
Not only will Y-12 be called upon to eventually dismantle components from the many nuclear warheads to be eliminated by New START, but the plant's modernization program - including the proposed multibillion-dollar Uranium Processing Facility - is expected to gain strong momentum from commitments made by President Barack Obama's administration during the drawn-out debate over the treaty with Russia.
Senate Republicans pushed for more support for modernization of the nuclear weapons complex and improved maintenance of the U.S. nuclear arsenal during the New START proceedings, and U.S. Sens. Lamar Alexander and Bob Corker of Tennessee were among the Republicans who announced Tuesday that they would vote for ratification.
Both of the Tennessee senators played important roles, with Corker on the front-lines of the debate as a member of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee and Alexander exerting influence as the No. 3 Republican in the Senate. Both said modernization of U.S. nuclear capabilities was instrumental in their support.
In his statement from the Senate floor, Corker said, "Many people have focused during this debate on the fact that we have 1,500 warheads as a limitation, if you will, in this treaty, but they fail to realize we have over 5,000 warheads in our nuclear arsenal, all of which need to be modernized, all of which are getting ready to be obsolete if we don't make the investment."
There are seven facilities in the country, including Y-12 in Oak Ridge, that deal with the nuclear arsenal and needed to be upgraded, Corker said, adding, "There is no question in my mind, if it weren't for the discussion of this treaty, we would not have the commitments that we have today on modernization."
The Obama administration's updated nuclear defense plan calls for investing $86 billion at these facilities over the next decade, and UPF is a key part of the spending plan.
The Uranium Processing Facility at Y-12 would be used for processing weapons-grade uranium that's taken out of old weapons, as well as refurbishing nuclear warhead parts for weapons that remain in the active arsenal. UPF is now estimated to cost somewhere between $4.2 billion and $6.5 billion, with construction to take place over the next decade.
Although UPF is hugely expensive, supporters say it is necessary to conduct the national security missions in a safe and efficient manner. New technologies would replace the old equipment now used in deteriorated, Cold War facilities at the Oak Ridge site. The consolidated production center would actually employ fewer workers than today's complex, but its construction would further validate Y-12's future role in the nuclear defense and nonproliferation programs.
In a recent interview, Y-12 General Manager Darrel Kohlhorst acknowledged that the debate on New START came at a good time when seeking funding approval for a project costing billions of dollars.
"It's been, obviously, in the news and with the senators that have come to visit us. The modernization of the complex is very important to them as part of the whole New START program. So, yeah, that's been kind of nice for us to see the senators come and take the time, spend the time to get to know Y-12 and know why UPF is so important," Kohlhorst said.
The new facilities will allow Y-12 to do its job in remaking warhead parts and maintaining a "credible deterrent" for the United States, he said. "The other positive for us on UPF is that it has a lot of other purposes. It also allows us to dismantle those weapons that are coming out of the stockpile and to take that uranium and put it back into the process where it can then be used for the Navy reactors or for research reactors or even to declare it excess and ultimately down-blended for commercial use."
Alexander joined with three other senators in writing a letter to President Obama earlier this week, expressing support for the treaty but also pushing for clearer commitments on the funding requests for U.S. nuclear weapons programs.
"We look forward to working with you on the ratification of the New START Treat and modernization of the National Nuclear Security Agency's nuclear weapons facilities. This represents a long-term commitment by each of us, as modernization of our nuclear arsenal will require a sustained effort," stated the letter, which was signed by Alexander and Sens. Daniel Inouye, D-Hawaii; Thad Cochran, R-Miss.; and Dianne Feinstein, D-Calif.
In his response letter, Obama promised to provide annual updated in the defense authorization plan, known as the 1251 report, outlining specific budget requests identified with the nuclear upgrades.
Senior writer Frank Munger may be reached at 865-342-6329.

description.hltext_display: Welcome to the leisure domes - new hope for Hengrove Park complex
description.content:
BRISTOL'S council leaders are being urged to resurrect plans for a massive leisure complex at Hengrove Park which would generate an estimated 3,000 jobs.
The centrepiece of the complex, inspired by the Eden Project in Cornwall, would be two large leisure domes – one with a pool and one with snow for skiing and other winter sports.
There would also be other facilities such as a hotel and leisure centre.
The complex would be next to Hengrove Way, lying between the existing Cineworld cinema and Whitchurch Lane. It would need private investors to pay for the scheme as the cash-strapped council does not have the money to fund such a project.
The idea is being promoted by former Liberal Democrat cabinet councillor Anne White, who passionately believes it would help to regenerate South Bristol.
She is fed up that parents have to take their children to Swindon or Bridgwater to play in a leisure pool or Bowood Park near Chippenham or Centre Parcs near Longleat, in Wiltshire, for outdoor fun.
"It would be somewhere for active leisure as opposed to thrills and spills like you get at Alton Towers," said Mrs White, a mother of four.
"Instead of having to travel miles outside Bristol, we could have something really special on our doorsteps," she said.
Hengrove Park was the perfect site, partly because it was so big, there would be plenty of room to leave some of it as open parkland.
When Mrs White was a cabinet councillor in 2007, she persuaded the council to commission a consultants' report by Humberts Leisure into using part of Hengrove Park for leisure facilities which she said turned out to be very positive.
But after the Lib Dems lost power, she said the report fell on deaf ears.
She took up the cause again last year which resulted in the new Lib Dem administration agreeing to an update on the consultants' report which says: "Hengrove Park clearly offers the potential to create a major leisure destination of regional and possibly national significance.
"The site offers an opportunity to attract substantial inward investment, and potentially act as a regeneration catalyst for South Bristol.
"Basic job estimates suggest that there would be a net gain of more than 3,000 new jobs arising from the development."
Mrs White, who is no longer a councillor, is now worried that private investors will look elsewhere in the region to site a giant-scale leisure complex.
She read in the Evening Post that North Somerset Council is courting the idea of a similar project on part of the former airfield site at Locking next to the Helicopter Museum.
She is urging the current Lib Dem cabinet to seize the opportunity to back the project because she believes that Bristol is much better placed to site a major tourist attraction.
Deputy council leader Simon Cook said a large-scale leisure complex at Hengrove Park was an option.
But he said it was difficult to see in the current economic climate how a private investor could be persuaded to spend millions of pounds on such a scheme.
"We have always said that phase two would involve development of some kind.
"If there were recreational facilities that provided employment opportunities, then the payback for people who live in Hengrove would be a properly-landscaped park instead of an open green space.
"We haven't shut the door on this idea but we have to recognise that it's not easy to get such projects off the ground, given the current economic climate."

description.hltext_display: مجلس الشيوخ يفتح الطريق للتصديق على معاهدة ستارت
description.content:
واشنطن (ا ف ب) - فتح مجلس الشيوخ الاميركي الثلاثاء الطريق للتصديق على معاهدة الحد من السلاح النووي (ستارت) بموافقته على انهاء المناقشات بتصويت اختباري حصلت فيه المعاهدة على اغلبية 67 صوتا من مائة.
واقر اعضاء المجلس ب67 صوتا مقابل 28 المذكرة التي تتيح انهاء المناقشات بعد سبعة ايام كاملة من التراشقات المكثفة امام المجلس.
وتامل الاغلبية الديموقراطية، متشجعة بنتيجة هذا التصويت، اجراء تصويت للتصديق النهائي على المعاهدة في الساعات المقبلة اي اعتبارا من مساء الثلاثاء او الاربعاء.
واعتبر السناتور الديموقراطي جون كيري رئيس لجنة الشؤون الخارجية الذي قاد المناقشات داخل مجلس الشيوخ حول المصادقة على ستارت، في بيان بث بعد التصويت "نحن على وشك كتابة الفصل المقبل في تاريخ مكافحة تهديد الاسلحة النووية".
ويسيطر الديموقراطيون حاليا على 58 مقعدا من مائة في مجلس الشيوخ الاميركي. ومن ثم ينقصهم اصوات تسعة جمهوريين للتوصل الى الاصوات ال67 اللازمة للتصديق اي ثلثي المجلس.
وبعد هذا التصويت الاول يبدو ان التصديق اصبح محسوما. وبالفعل، فان ما مجموعه 11 سناتورا جمهوريا صوتوا لصحالح المصادقة على المعاهدة.
وتعارض روسيا اي تعديل في المعاهدة، كما اعلن الاثنين وزير الخارجية سيرغي لافروف. ولن يصدق البرلمان الروسي على المعاهدة الا بعد تصديق مجلس الشيوخ الاميركي.
وكان اعضاء مجلس الشيوخ الاميركي يعتزمون الثلاثاء تعديل "قرار المصادقة" وهو وثيقة داخلية في مجلس الشيوخ بهدف الرد على هواجس الجمهوريين حول مصير نظام الدفاع الاميركي المضاد للصواريخ. وان مثل هذا العمل لن يكون له تاثير على المعاهدة بحد ذاتها بما انه لن يلزم سوى الاميركيين.

description.hltext_display: Pedophilia Guide Author Denies Book Is Obscene
description.content:
Phillip Greaves Charged With Violating Fla.'s Obscenity Law
UPDATED: 4:06 pm CST December 21, 2010
Email Print
Author Of Pedophilia Guide Faces Charges In Fla.
Embed this Video
Facebook
Digg
Twitter
Yahoo Buzz
Reddit
Delicious
Link
BARTOW, Fla. -- A Colorado man who wrote a how-to guide for pedophiles said Tuesday that his book is not obscene.
Phillip Greaves, 47, of Pueblo, Colo., arrived at the Polk County jail in central Florida on Tuesday morning and is due in court Wednesday afternoon, officials said.
He was arrested Monday in Colorado and charged with violating Florida's obscenity law, a third-degree felony. If convicted, he faces a maximum of five years in state prison.
Speaking to reporters outside the jail Tuesday, Greaves denied the book is obscene and said he plans to fight the charge.
"I characterize it as a book of showing people who have been improperly represented," he said. "And also telling people how they can go about to improve their own lives and so that these people that are being incarcerated now can possibly be rehabilitated."
Polk County Sheriff Grady Judd claims jurisdiction because Greaves sold and mailed the book to undercover deputies who had written him requesting a copy.
Florida's obscenity law prohibits the "distribution of obscene material depicting minors engaged in conduct harmful to minors."
The book was briefly for sale on Amazon.com but was yanked in November after it prompted online outrage.

description.hltext_display: 'Golden Boy' Balotelli: Alleen Messi is nog een klein beetje beter
description.content: 22/12/10, 09u05 De quotes van Balotelli zijn geregeld even grappig/ridicuul als de muts die hij maandag droeg. Mario Balotelli, de Italiaanse spits van Manchester City, heeft nog eens een interview gegeven en dat brengt haast altijd de nodige verontwaardiging met zich mee. Zoals het aan de tijdsperiode aangepaste hoofddeksel dat hij maandagavond droeg voor en na de verloren wedstrijd tegen Everton, waardoor hij er als een halve kalkoen bijliep. Balotelli wordt van het veld geholpen tegen Everton. � ap Hoe is zijn naam? Wil...? Nee, die ken ik niet. Balotelli over nummer twee Jack Wilshere 'SuperMario' werd door de Italiaanse krant Tuttosport uitgeroepen tot 'Golden Boy', een jaarlijkse trofee die de beste jongere onder 21 jaar op de Europese velden lauwert. Balotelli haalde het voor Jack Wilshere van Arsenal en David de Gea, doelman van Atlético Madrid.De overwinningsspeech van Balotelli luidde als volgt: "Er is eigenlijk maar één speler die nog een klein beetje beter is dan mezelf en dat is Messi. Al de anderen heb ik achter me gelaten. Ik ben erg blij dat ik deze trofee win, maar wie anders zou hem verdienen? Twee jaar geleden werd ik negende, vorig jaar vierde. Logisch dat het nu mijn beurt is."Waarschijnlijk bedoelde Balotelli dit toch als een grap, mogen we hopen. De spits was echter nog niet uitgesproken en had ook nog een woordje over voor nummer twee Jack Wilshere. "Hoe is zijn naam? Wil...? Nee, die ken ik niet. Maar de volgende keer dat we tegen Arsenal spelen zal ik oppassen. Misschien moet ik hem dan de Golden Boy-trofee tonen en hem erop attent maken dat ik degene ben die hem gewonnen heeft." (odbs) � photo news

description.hltext_display: Nives Čanović vrijedno vježba jogu triput na tjedan
description.content: Lijepa Nives Čanović zadala si je šestomjesečni plan. Naime, simpatična glumica i odnedavno radijska voditeljica od početka studenog triput tjedno vježba jogu. Kako i sama kaže, osjeća se odlično, a i stekla je nova poznanstva.

description.hltext_display: Vor dem Papst-Besuch: Gysi will sich mit dem Papst anlegen
description.author: kna
description.content:
Linken-Chef Gregor Gysi würde sich beim Papstbesuch gern mal "ein paar Minuten mit ihm streiten".Das könnte eine angeregte Unterhaltung werden: Linken-Fraktionschef Gregor Gysi würde beim Papstbesuch im September 2011 gerne vom Kirchenoberhaupt empfangen werden. „Dann könnte ich ein paar Minuten mit ihm streiten", sagte er der Katholischen Nachrichten-Agentur in Berlin. Die Rede von im Bundestag werde er genau verfolgen.
Gysi, der jüdische Wurzeln hat und sich selbst als Heide bezeichnet, unterstrich zugleich die Bedeutung von Papst und Kirche als moralischer Autorität für die moderne Welt. „Die Kirche trägt eine Großverantwortung." Derzeit seien nur die Kirchen in der Lage, „einigermaßen allgemeinverbindlich Moralnormen zu formulieren", meinte er. So müsse die katholische Kirche eine viel größere Rolle spielen im „Kampf gegen den Krieg als Mittel der Politik, bei der Überwindung von Elend und Hunger auf der Erde und bei einer anderen Integrationspolitik".
Zugleich äußerte der Linkenpolitiker Kritik an der katholischen Sexualmoral. Er halte es für falsch, Ansprüche aufrechterhalten zu wollen, die mit dem normalen Leben nichts mehr zu tun hätten. „Dann verletzen die Gläubigen doch die Normen. Und gewöhnen sich daran, auch andere Normen nicht mehr einzuhalten. Das ist ungut", so der 62-Jährige.
Zwischen der Linken und den Kirchen sieht Gysi nach eigenem Bekunden keine unüberwindbare Kluft. Die Moral der Linken sei „tief jüdisch-christlich geprägt". Nur: Viele ihrer Mitglieder wüssten das nicht mehr. Mit seinen Positionen zur Bedeutung der Kirchen habe er bei Linken im Osten „wenig Schwierigkeiten, im Westen gelegentlich schon". Ost-Linke hätten wegen der Behandlung der Kirchen zu DDR-Zeiten ein schlechtes Gewissen. „Insofern sind sie offener."

description.hltext_display: Korea Tops in Internet Speed¡¦
Doris Vrečko je puštena kući na dalnji oporavak
description.content: Manekenka i voditeljica ‘Automotiva’ Doris Vrečko puštena je na kućnu njegu i uspješno se oporavlja nakon što je prije dva mjeseca pala u nesvijest. Nakon što nije mogla ni hodati ni govoriti, pa su se svi njezini najbliži jako zabrinuli za njezino zdravlje, oporavlja se i veseli blagdanima s najmilijima.

description.hltext_display: Obama signing 'don't ask, don't tell' repeal
description.content:
Fulfilling a campaign pledge, cheering his party's downcast liberals and striking a blow for what he sees as basic human rights, President Barack Obama is signing a landmark law Wednesday that tells America's armed services to let homosexuals serve openly for the first time.
So many gay rights and Democratic activists were expected at the signing ceremony that the White House booked a large auditorium at the Interior Department.
"This day has come!" said an elated Mike Almy, an Air Force major discharged four years ago when his sexual orientation became known. "'Don't ask, don't tell' is over, and you no longer have to sacrifice your integrity."
AP Photo - Speaker Nancy Pelosi, D-Calif., right, applauds as former service members Sgt. First Class Stacy Vasquez, left, and current service member Lt. Col. Victor Fehrenbach, and former service member Major Mike Almy, hold the signed bill to repeal Don't Ask Don't Tell, during an enrollment ceremony on Capitol Hill in Washington Tuesday, Dec. 21, 2010.
While the elation is real, Pentagon officials caution it could be premature, since the bill requires service chiefs to complete implementation plans before lifting the old policy - and certify to lawmakers that it won't damage combat readiness, as critics charge.
Also, guidelines must be finalized that cover a host of practical questions, from how to educate troops to how sexual orientation should be handled in making barracks assignments.
While officials have avoided timetables, the process will probably take months.
Still, for gay and lesbian Americans, Wednesday is a watershed. And for Obama, it is a day to revel in the achievement of a goal he's long championed.
It is also the second of three expected victories in what's turned out to be - for Obama - a surprisingly productive lame-duck Congress. Weeks after his self-described "shellacking" in the midterm vote, he's won lopsided approval of a tax cut compromise, and the Senate is poised to deliver his top foreign policy goal: ratification of a new nuclear arms treaty with Russia.
Many Democratic liberals were furious over the tax package, believing Obama blithely yielded to Republican demands to retain the same tax cuts for the rich he had loudly denounced on the campaign trail. That's not the case with the repeal of don't ask, don't tell. Lifting of the ban on gays serving openly was something Obama not only campaigned on in 2008 but reiterated in this year's State of the Union speech.
"I will work with Congress and our military to finally repeal the law that denies gay Americans the right to serve the country they love because of who they are," he said in January to cheers in the House chamber, adding, "It's the right thing to do."
Born 17 years ago as a compromise between President Bill Clinton and a resistant Pentagon, the "don't ask, don't tell" policy became for gay rights campaigners a notorious roadblock on the way to full acceptance.
Speaking in June at a Gay Pride Month observance at the White House, Obama likened the fight to end it to the struggle of American blacks for civil rights.
"We have never been closer to ending this discriminatory policy," he declared.
Yet he has also faced rising discontent among gay activists who believed he hadn't moved forcefully enough. He's been heckled at campaign appearances over AIDS funding and the failure to end the military service ban.
Obama countered that as commander-in-chief, he had to ensure the ban's end is carefully prepared for.
That's just what the bill from Congress mandates.
"The implementation and certification process will not happen immediately; it will take time," Air Force Chief of Staff Gen. Norton Schwartz warned in an e-mail that went out right after Saturday's Senate vote. "Meanwhile, the current law remains in effect. All Air Force members should conduct themselves accordingly."
Military and administration officials are wrestling with numerous legal questions raised by the end of the ban - knowing that courts are waiting in the wings. They include what to do about pending expulsion proceedings, and when those ousted under don't-ask-don't-tell might apply to rejoin the armed forces.
For Almy, who appeared at a Capitol Hill ceremony Monday, the important thing is that gay and lesbian service members are no longer singled out because of who they love.
"That's all we ever wanted," he told reporters, "not special rights, just the same as our straight counterparts. "

event_or_fact.property: I will work with Congress and our military to finally repeal the law that denies gay Americans the right to serve the country they love because of who they are
We have never been closer to ending this discriminatory policy
The implementation and certification process will not happen immediately; it will take time; Meanwhile, the current law remains in effect. All Air Force members should conduct themselves accordingly.
to let homosexuals serve openly for the first time

description.hltext_display: Fuelers unsung heroes of Task Force Comanche
description.content:
FORWARD OPERATING BASE SHINDAND, Afghanistan — As the pilots of Task Force Comanche, 4th Combat Aviation Brigade, 4th Infantry Division continue their extremely high tempo of operations, task force fuelers from Company E are there to support the demand for continuous refuel.
The fuelers run 24-hour refueling operations at Forward Operating Base Shindand in support of helicopters in Regional Command (West). Refueling during a mission is dependent upon Task Force Comanche forward arming and refueling points. In order to sustain the aircraft during their missions, Task Force Comanche currently runs two separate forward arming and refueling points.
One of them is located at a Spanish Fordward Operating Base. As the current Spanish unit prepares to redeploy, the Task Force Comanche team is key to integrating incoming forces into the area. The U.S. team works with the Spanish fuelers on a daily basis to ensure that both countries' missions are completed successfully.
Task force soldiers will help the new Spanish fuelers learn the tactics used in Afghanistan.
While stationed at the base, Task Force Comanche soldiers are responsible for the set-up, maintenance and manning of the forward arming and refuling points. By the end of this month, the team is expecting to hit the half-million mark of gallons of fuel pumped since the beginning of their deployment.
This number does not include the volunteer fueling missions they help the Spanish perform. The Spanish Army has a refuel point for their vehicles and aircraft, but they do not have "hot refuel" capabilities. Task Force Comanche does have the ability to fuel an aircraft while it is still running, called a "hot refuel." The soldiers refuel as many as 16 U.S. Army aircraft a day.
The team, led by U.S. Army Staff Sgt. Raphael Ayala, works 24-hour operations to fuel aircraft any time, day or night. Through a system of hand and arm signals, soldiers communicate with each other in order to complete various tasks simultaneously. Between the forward arming and refueling soldiers and the aircraft pilots, everyone remains focused to ensure efficiency, safety and accuracy.
"The deployment to Afghanistan and working with the Spaniards for an entire year was a great experience for every POL soldier to be a part of something very special and meaningful," Ayala, said.
The other remote forward arming and refueling team is led by Staff Sgt. Gilroy Barros. The small contingency of Army personnel on this base are mostly from Task Force Comanche and are there to support the refueling mission.
"My guys know that every mission here is important," Barros, said. "They understand that when any type of aircraft arrive on our landing zone, they need to refuel them in a safe and timely manner to get to their next destination."
These soldiers fuel Spanish, Italian and other International Security Assistance Force forces and civilian aircraft in addition to those of the U.S. forces. Like the Spanish Forward Operating Base, this team also works 24-hour operations.
The soldiers have pumped more than 300,000 gallons of fuel during the deployment.
Comanche fuelers rotate through positions on all forward arming and refueling points including Shindand. Though they are away from the task force, the soldiers at both fueling points are critical pieces to the accomplishment of the Task Force Comanche mission.
"These soldiers are a quintessential part of the Task Force Comanche team. We can't complete our missions without them," said Capt. Lionel Macklin Jr., Echo Company, Task Force Comanche commander.

My guys know that every mission here is important; They understand that when any type of aircraft arrive on our landing zone, they need to refuel them in a safe and timely manner to get to their next destination.
These soldiers are a quintessential part of the Task Force Comanche team.; We can't complete our missions without them

description.hltext_display: Balder och Catena i miljardaffär
description.content:
Balder lägger bud på 25 handelsfastigheter av Catena i Stockholm, Göteborg och Östersund. Det framgår av pressmeddelanden från de bägge bolagen. Catena har inom sin pågående försäljningsprocess hämtat in anbud på sitt samlade fastighetsbestånd, med undantag för bolagets fastigheter i Solna vilka fortsatt kommer att ägas av Catena.
Efter en utvärdering av mottagna bud har Catenas styrelse i samråd med rådgivaren Catella konstaterat att Balder inkommit med det mest fördelaktiga anbudet, framgår det.
Balders bud på fastigheterna anges till cirka 1,6 miljarder kronor. Från det beloppet ska viss del av uppskjuten skatt på fastigheterna avräknas för att slutlig köpeskilling ska kunna fastställas.
Mot bakgrund av att Erik Selin är styrelseledamot i såväl Catena som i Balder föreligger ett jävsförhållande, vilket medför att avtalet inte kommer att undertecknas innan extra bolagsstämmor på de bägge bolagen godkänt förvärvet.
Enligt en preliminär tidplan kommer de extra bolagsstämmorna och överlåtelseavtalets undertecknande att ske under januari 2011.

description.hltext_display: Cadeaux de Noël : la revente se généralise
Debatt: Utredning ska föreslå lägre företagsskatter
description.content:
﻿Regeringen tillsätter en kommitté för att se över företagsbeskattningen. Kommittén ska lämna förslag på hur företagsbeskattningen, främst för aktiebolag, kan reformeras för att gynna investeringar och skapa fler jobb. Utredningen ska vara klar den 1 november 2013, skriver finansminister Anders Borg och näringsminister Maud Olofsson på DI Debatt. Sverige återhämtar sig allt tydligare efter efter finanskrisen. Sysselsättningen ökar och arbetslösheten sjunker. I fokus står att åter bygga upp överskott i de offentliga finanserna för att kunna möta nästa kris med en kraftfull politik som kan dämpa de negativa effekterna på produktion och sysselsättning.
Sveriges ekonomiska utgångsläge är en konkurrensfördel. I många andra europeiska länder genomförs nu betydande nedskärningar.
Vi har i stället en möjlighet att förbereda Sverige för de utmaningar som globaliseringen ställer oss inför. Det är mot den bakgrunden man ska se översynen av företagsbeskattningen.
Vi lever och verkar i en värld som ständigt förändras. Nya industriländer växer fram, samtidigt som konkurrensen mellan gamla industriländer ökar.
Villkor för investeringar och produktion måste ständigt prövas för att säkra att Sverige är och förblir en stark ekonomi med livskraftiga företag och en god jobbtillväxt.
Alliansregeringens inriktning är att möta globaliseringen och den ständigt pågående strukturomvandlingen med konkurrenskraftiga villkor för företagen. Så tryggar vi jobben, som är grunden för vår gemensamma välfärd med dagis, skolor och sjukvård.
Regeringen har genomfört en rad viktiga reformer för att få fler i arbete. Det har blivit mer lönsamt att arbeta genom framför allt jobbskatteavdraget. Det har också blivit lättare och billigare att anställa, bland annat genom sänkta socialavgifter för unga.
För att skapa goda villkor för att starta och driva företag har regeringen bland annat förbättrat trygghetssystemen för företagare, sänkt bolagsskatten, sänkt arbetsgivar- och egenavgifterna, förbättrat 3:12-reglerna och slopat förmögenhetsskatten.
Reforminriktningen är att fortsätta stärka villkoren för att starta och driva företag i Sverige och för att lokalisera moderbolag och huvudkontor här.
Regeringen tillsätter därför inom kort en kommitté som får i uppdrag att se över företagsbeskattningen, främst för aktiebolag, för att gynna investeringar och skapa fler jobb.
Utredningen ska vara klar den 1 november 2013. Kommittén kommer under 2012 att lämna ett delbetänkande med förslag på skatteincitament för att stimulera tillgången på riskvilligt kapital och investeringar i forskning och utveckling.
Kommittén ska bland annat undersöka olika möjligheter att minska beskattningen av riskkapital i bolagssektorn och göra villkoren mer lika för finansiering med eget kapital och med lån.
Det finns ett värde i ansvarsfulla enskilda ägare som kan stå för långsiktighet och närvaro i den svenska företagssektorn. Kommittén bör i så stor utsträckning som möjligt sträva efter att ta fram förslag som breddar bolagsskattebasen för att finansiera en sänkning av de skatter som betalas av bolagssektorn. Sådana sänkningar bör göras på ett sådant sätt att de gynnar investeringar. Det ökar kapitalbestånd och reallöner vilket i sin tur leder till en ökad BNP och tillväxt samt till en högre välfärd. Trygg tillgång till kapital är centralt för produktion och investeringar. Det visar inte minst erfarenheterna av den ekonomiska krisen. Det är angeläget att stärka det egna kapitalet i bolagssektorn. Det gäller för etablerade företag med god tillgång till de internationella kapitalmarknaderna, men där en stärkt soliditet kan öka motståndskraften vid ekonomiska nedgångar.
Ett tillräckligt eget kapital är också viktigt för nyetablering av företag där konkursrisken, i frånvaro av ett tillräckligt eget kapital, ibland är av privatekonomiskt slag. Särskilt gäller det för riskfyllda projekt.
Utredningen ska, med utgångspunkt i de förslag som presenterades i Skatteincitamentsutredningens betänkande våren 2009, lämna förslag på skatteincitament för att stimulera riskvilligt kapital. Utredningen ska dessutom se över de skattemässiga villkoren för forskning och utveckling, FoU-avdrag.
Konkurrenskraftiga villkor för forskning och innovation är centralt för att kunna säkra att Sverige kan skapa god tillväxt. Skatteregler som ger incitament till ökade investeringar i FoU kan här spela en viktig roll.
Därtill är det viktigt att se över andra villkor för entreprenörskap och förutsättningarna att starta och driva företag som inte omfattas av kommitténs arbete. De nuvarande reglerna för den så kallade expertskatten, skattelättnad för utländska nyckelpersoner, infördes 2001. Syftet var att förbättra villkoren att anställa och behålla kompetent personal från utlandet. Reglerna har kritiserats för bristande förutsägbarhet, krångel och att handläggningstiderna är långa.
För att tillgodose de svenska företagens behov av personal med särskild kompetens finns det därmed anledning att se över och förenkla expertskatten. Det finns skäl att pröva om vi behöver ta ytterligare steg i reformeringen och förenklingen av beskattningen för fåmansföretag, för att på så vis stimulera företagande.
Sverige ska tillbaka till överskott i de offentliga finanserna. Vi måste säkerställa den ekonomiska återhämtningen och skapa förutsättningar för fler jobb och fler företag.
Utgångspunkten för kommitténs uppdrag är därmed att olika reformalternativ sammantaget ska vara offentligfinansiellt neutrala.
Skatteförändringarna som utredningen presenterar kan inte bli aktuella att genomföra förrän vi är trygga med att de offentliga finanserna uppvisar överskott samt att vi har ett varaktigt reformutrymme. Sverige ska anta den globala utmaningen och vara ett konkurrenskraftigt och dynamiskt land i en föränderlig omvärld.
Anders Borg, finansminister (M)
Maud Olofsson, näringsminister (C)

description.hltext_display: Merafe May Raise Stake In Xstrata Venture, Smelter
description.content:
JOHANNESBURG -(Dow Jones)- Merafe Resources Ltd. (MRF.JO) said Wednesday it may raise its minority stake in a chrome joint venture with Xstrata PLC (XTA.LN) and take a greater interest in the Swiss mining company's planned 360,000 metric ton a year ferrochrome smelter in South Africa.
Xstrata in October gave the go ahead to the second phase of its Lion ferrochrome expansion, which will boost the Xstrata-Merafe venture's capacity to more than 2.3 million tons a year. Merafe at the time said it would decide by the end of the year whether to participate in the expansion project, which would mean investing about 1 billion rand ($147 million).
The Johannesburg-based company said it is discussing with Xstrata an option to increase its interest in the Lion II project and the chrome venture to as much as 26% from 20.5% currently.
Lion II had been waiting to proceed for about three years while Xstrata waited for South Africa's state power company to allocate electricity capacity to the project. Xstrata has said the development of the project, including the smelter, will cost about $710 million. Construction is set to begin in the first quarter of 2011. Copyright � 2010 Dow Jones Newswires

description.hltext_display: AION Sets a Remarkable Record of 100 Consecutive Weeks at the Top
Bamburullstolar till japanskt flyg
description.author: TT
description.content:
Japan Airlines (JAL) har kommit på ett sätt för rullstolsburna flygpassagerare att slippa tidsödande extrakontroller - rullstolar av bambu.
"Med en rullstol i bambu kan fysiskt utsatta passagerare färdas snabbt till gaten, de förblir sittande genom säkerhetskontrollen", heter det i ett pressmeddelande från JAL.
De sofistikerade fordonen går loss på 600 000 yen (50 000 kronor) styck, och införs på japanska flygplatser under 2011. Aktivera javascript för att se

description.hltext_display: Apple aussi fait la guerre à WikiLeaks
description.content:
mercredi 22 décembre 2010 à 08h07 Le géant américain Apple a décidé de supprimer l'application WikiLeaks destinée à ses iPhone et iPad, et permettant à ceux qui l'achètent de consulter les documents mis en ligne sur le site d'information, et de donner accès au Twitter de WikiLeaks.
© Reuters
Le groupe informatique américain Apple a indiqué mardi qu'il avait retiré de la vente une application non officielle WikiLeaks destinée au téléphone iPhone et à la tablette iPad, parce qu'elle n'était pas conforme à ses règlements. "Les applications doivent respecter les lois locales", a déclaré à l'AFP Trudy Miller, porte-parole d'Apple. "Elles ne doivent pas créer de préjudice à une personne ou un groupe donnés". "Nous avons retiré l'application WikiLeaks de l'App Store parce qu'elle enfreignait nos consignes destinées aux programmeurs de logiciels", a ajouté Trudy Miller, se refusant à tout commentaire supplémentaire.
L'application WikiLeaks coûtait 1,99 dollar et permettait de consulter sur un appareil mobile les contenus proposés par le site de l'organisation. Elle donnait aussi accès à son fil Twitter. Approuvée vendredi par Apple, elle a été retirée de l'App Store lundi. Son développeur, Igor Barinov, avait indiqué sur Twitter qu'il avait prévu de reverser un dollar par téléchargement à l'organisation de Julian Assange.

description.hltext_display: Vasakronan i rekordaffär
description.content:
Vasakronan köper hela kvarteret Blåmannen, Klara Zenit, omgärdat av Klara Norra Kyrkogata, Mäster Samuelsgatan, Bryggargatan och Drottninggatan, för 4,35 miljarder kronor av Commerz Real. Det framgår av ett pressmeddelande.
Fastigheten Blåmannen 20 omfattar totalt omkring 70.000 kvadratmeter, huvudsakligen moderna kontor i bästa läge men med ett betydande inslag av cityhandel. Bland hyresgästerna finns bland annat Clas Ohlson, Hennes & Mauritz och Oriflame.
Under 2010 har Vasakronan sålt bostadsfastigheter för drygt fem miljarder kronor och köpt kontors- och butiksfastigheter för motsvarande belopp.
"Vi har haft en intensiv period med flera stora transaktioner under 2010, totalt har vi omsatt över elva miljarder kronor. Nu blir det en paus över jul, men jag tror att 2011 kommer att bli ett intressant år på fastighetsmarknaden", skriver Lars Johnsson, Vasakronans chef för fastighetsinvesteringar.
Enligt Linklaters, som agerat rådgivare, är affären den dyraste för en enskild fastighet i Sverige hittills. TT

description.hltext_display: Medewerkers vroegen Lakeman onderzoek in te stellen
description.content:
AMSTERDAM - Topmensen van Schiphol hebben met de jaarcijfers gesjoemeld om hogere bonussen te vangen. Dat zegt Pieter Lakeman woensdag in De Pers. Hij kreeg vorig jaar landelijke bekendheid door zijn oproep aan rekeninghouders van de DSB Bank om hun geld daar weg te halen.
Verschillende medewerkers van Schiphol zouden hem hebben gevraagd onderzoek te doen naar mogelijk wanbeleid bij de luchthaven. Voor hij begint, krijgt het bestuur zelf gelegenheid de 'misstanden' aan te pakken, zegt Lakeman in de krant.
Daarom heeft hij een brief gestuurd naar bestuursvoorzitter Jos Nijhuis. "Ik heb ze twee weken de tijd gegeven om te reageren." De reden voor het onderzoek zou het 'algemeen belang' zijn.
Lakeman is aandeelhouder van een bedrijf dat zaken heeft gedaan met Schiphol. Hij stelt dat hij zijn zaken met Schiphol niet zijn 'primaire drijfveer' zijn om achter de luchthaven aan te gaan.
Vooral financieel directeur Pieter Verboom zou de jaarwinst zo hebben gemanipuleerd dat hij een hogere bonus krijgt.
Er zou zijn gesjoemeld met opleverdata van vastgoedprojecten. Ook zou Verboom opdracht hebben gegeven rendementscijfers te vervalsen.
Dit gebeurde volgens Lakeman om projecten goedgekeurd te krijgen die eigenlijk niet aantrekkelijk waren voor Schiphol. In ruil hiervoor zou Verboom van de wederpartij een Frans huisje hebben gekregen.
Hierover zou Verboom zijn gehoord door de raad van commissarissen, maar die ontsloeg hem niet.
Lakeman rekent er volgens de krant niet op dat inderdaad een intern onderzoek wordt opgestart. "Als ze er niets mee doen, ga ik zelf aan de slag."
Hiervoor gaat hij jaarverslagen en het kadaster doorpluizen. "Ik kan natuurlijk altijd nog getuigen laten horen, als ik toch nog een rechtszaak tegen Schiphol begin."

description.hltext_display: III Corps headquarters prepares to leave Iraq
description.content:
Fort Hood Herald
It's a tough time of year to be deployed and away from loved ones, Lt. Gen. Robert Cone said from Iraq this weekend. In an effort to keep Fort Hood soldiers' spirits up in Iraq, leaders are encouraging troops to focus on rituals and celebrations that remind them they have each other.
Dining facilities will help facilitate that spirit by offering special meals and parties, Cone added.
The holidays can also be tough for the families of deployed soldiers, but Cone said Saturday that everyone in III Corps headquarters would be home well within a year of deploying, meaning they'd only miss one holiday season.
As III Corps headquarters heads into the homestretch of its yearlong deployment to Iraq, Cone said he has hosted town hall meetings for all 750 of the corps' deployed soldiers.
Cone serves as deputy commander for operations, U.S. Forces-Iraq, and commands III Corps.
The town halls focused on the work the soldiers did in the last 10 months, Cone said, and he encouraged them to finish strong.
The corps is set to complete a transfer of authority ceremony Feb. 8, handing over its mission to the XVIII Airborne Corps from Fort Bragg, N.C.
The deployment has centered around the very complex, sometimes tedious mission of bringing the Iraq war to a successful end, Cone said. It's that mission that keeps the 3rd Armored Cavalry Regiment and 1st Cavalry Division's 4th Advise and Assist Brigade busy. The 1st Cavalry's 3rd Brigade will deploy to Iraq in January, and its 1st and 2nd brigades are expected to do the same later that year.
The advise-and-assist mission is the most important task the U.S. forces have in Iraq, Cone said. They also assist the State Department, which will remain in the country after troops have departed, in establishing an embassy and consulates that will coordinate economic development and civil projects.
About 50,000 U.S. troops teach, coach and mentor 650,000 Iraqi Security Forces, Cone said. The soldiers share their skills so the Iraqis can carry out tasks previously completed by the Americans. It is very rare that an American soldier is directly engaged in combat, Cone said.
That doesn't mean American soldiers don't engage in combat, though. If there is an enemy threat, soldiers have the right and responsibility to defend themselves, Cone said.

description.hltext_display: ユナイテッド、キャロル獲得に名乗り？
description.content:
Share Share
Andy Carroll, England Vs France - International Friendly (GettyImages)
マンチェスター・ユナイテッドのサー・アレックス・ファーガソン監督が、ニューカッスルＦＷアンディ・キャロルに熱い視線を注いでいるようだ。
イギリス『メトロ』は、ファーガソン監督がチームにもう一人、ストライカーを加えることを望んでおり、キャロルに注目していると報じている。
ＦＷディミタール・ベルバトフは得点ランキングの首位を走っているが、ＦＷウェイン・ルーニーは難しい時期を過ごしている。ＦＷマイケル・オーウェンは、１月、もしくは来年夏にクラブを離れると予想されている。
その他の選手に関しては、ＦＷハビエル・エルナンデスは期待に応えているが、現時点でファーストチョイスではない。フェデリコ・マケダは、まだ真価を発揮しておらず、イタリア復帰が噂されている。

description.hltext_display: “No-Cover” New Year’s Eve Parties and a Party Package Atop the Tallest...
description.content:
Guests will enjoy a sophisticated and fun party at the Top of the Hyatt sky-lounge which overlooks the city skyline from La Jolla to Mexico.
Ring in 2011 atop the tallest building on the west coast waterfront at the 497-foot Manchester Grand Hyatt San Diego hotel, which is offering a “New Year’s Eve San Diego” package and special New Year’s Eve parties.
The downtown San Diego luxury hotel package is priced at $450 for 2 people. Guests will enjoy a sophisticated and fun party at the Top of the Hyatt sky-lounge which overlooks the city lights of the Gaslamp Quarter and on a clear night, the city skyline from La Jolla to Mexico. Following the party, guests of this special package can then take an elevator ride to a spacious and elegant Hyatt guestroom, offering the ultimate in comfort and convenience for the night of December 31.
In order to reserve and enjoy the “New Year’s Eve San Diego” package, guests must be 21 or older. Package inclusions are: standard guestroom accommodation (premium view guestroom available for $475), entrance for two to the Top of the Hyatt event with doors opening at 9:00 p.m. and open until 1:00 a.m., a hosted premium bar and champagne, party hats, favors and midnight champagne toast, tray passed hors d'oeuvres, dancing to interactive DJ, New Year's Day breakfast buffet for two. Tax is included in this package offer.
Redfield’s Sports Bar: Must be 21, no cover, open to public from 8:00 p.m. to 1:30 a.m., DJ spinning club hits, limited appetizer menu items available for purchase, seating on first-come basis.
Grand Lobby Bar for All Ages Until 9 p.m.: No cover, open to public from 8:00 p.m. to 1:30 a.m., all ages welcome until 9 p.m., then 21 and over after 9 p.m., dancing to Top 40 Hits from 70s, 80s, 90s & 00s, limited appetizer menu items available for purchase, midnight balloon drop, seating on first-come basis.
Sally’s Seafood on the Water: New Year’s Eve special dinner menu - 3 courses: $45; 4 courses: $55, plus tax and gratuities. Regular menu and fresh sushi are also available from 5:30 p.m. to 11:00 p.m., last seating at 10:30 p.m., live jazz trio, reservations highly recommended at 619-358-6740.
Lael’s Restaurant: New Year’s Eve Surf & Turf Buffet: Prime Rib and amazing seafood, $65 per person plus tax and gratuities from 6:00 p.m. to 10:00 p.m., piano music, reservations highly recommended at 619-358-6735.
Manchester Grand Hyatt San Diego
One Market Place, San Diego, CA 92101
619-232-1234 or 800-233-1234
All hotel New Year’s Eve info is available on website: http://www.manchestergrandhyattsandiego.com/new-years-eve-2010
About the Manchester Grand Hyatt San Diego
Located on the Gaslamp Quarter’s waterfront, the Manchester Grand Hyatt San Diego overlooks San Diego Bay and many rooms offer spectacular views of the Pacific Ocean too. This urban resort defines San Diego’s skyline and is comprised of two stylish towers, the 33-story Seaport Tower and the 40-story Harbor Tower, the latter of which is 497-feet tall, making it the tallest building on the west coast waterfront. Connecting the two towers is a four-story building that boasts a rooftop pool with a 25,000 square-foot deck. The stylish Hyatt includes 95 one-and-two-bedroom suites, Kin Spa with full-service salon with private pool, tennis courts, bay-view pool and deck, a fitness center and several award-winning restaurants and lounges –most all overlooking the bay. It is adjacent to Seaport Village, near Horton Plaza and convenient to San Diego International Airport, San Diego Zoo and Sea World. For more information, call (619) 232-1234 and visit http://www.manchestergrandhyattsandiego.com.

description.hltext_display: IPTV Subscribers Top 3 Million
Super fit Shepherd lifts Force spirits
description.content:
Western Force coach Richard Graham has backed Cameron Shepherd to return to his blistering best, claiming the utility back has finally overcome a litany of injuries that threatened to derail his Super rugby career.
Shepherd hasn't missed a beat during the Force's gruelling pre-season campaign, returning strongly from a hamstring complaint that kept him out of the recent Wallabies tour of Europe.
Graham believed Shepherd, who has suffered numerous setbacks since breaking his left fibula in eight places in 2007, would return to top form next season.
"He's probably in the best condition he's been in for a number of years,'' Graham said at training today.
"I think it was important for him personally that he didn't go on that Wallabies tour, that he had a period of time where he could regain confidence in his body as much as anything.
"Physically, we are really pleased. (He has completed) absolutely everything (this pre-season), hasn't missed a session."
A fit Shepherd will be vital to the Force's chances of making an impact in 2011 after finishing a lowly 13th last season.
Former Hurricanes five-eighth Willie Ripia will also play a key role, with Wallabies star James O'Connor and Gene Fairbanks to be used at 10 should Ripia be injured at any point.
"Ten is a pivotal position. You only have to look at the team's that have won and the correlation between that and the 10s they've had," Graham said.
"Willie's a really good lad, fitted very well into the group and he'll give us some good direction.
"He's now played four years of Super rugby, 40 Super rugby caps.
"So he's established himself at this level of football... he'll be very good for us going forward."
Former Hurricanes winger David Smith was forced to watch on from the sidelines today after suffering a minor roll of his ankle earlier in the week.
The Force's Wallaby contingent will link up with the side on January 10, with Graham predicting they may be taken aback by the superior level of fitness the rest of the squad has achieved over the past eight weeks.
"Everything has been accountable and there have been no hiding places," Graham said.
"Particularly for the younger players coming into the program, it's probably been the most challenging thing they've ever done physically and mentally.
"The senior players have also found it difficult... the benchmark is international rugby.
"Certainly for this group, they'll challenge some of the Wallabies with what they've done over the last eight weeks."
Although the Force have reached excellent levels in their fitness over the past eight weeks, it certainly hasn't helped their singing abilities, which are on full display in a humorous You Tube video celebrating the festive season.
AAP

description.hltext_display: Ticker: Indien testet atomwaffenfähige Rakete
description.content: Neu Delhi (dpa) - Einen Tag nach Pakistan hat auch Erzrivale Indien wieder atomwaffenfähige Raketen getestet. Die Starts seien erfolgreich verlaufen, sagte ein Sprecher des Verteidigungsministeriums in Neu Delhi. Zwei Boden-Boden-Raketen mit einer Reichweite von 350 Kilometern seien von einem Testgelände an Küste des ostindischen Bundesstaats Orissa abgefeuert worden. Pakistan hatte erst gestern eine atomwaffenfähige Rakete getestet.

description.hltext_display: Doosan Heavy Industries & Construction Selected for Vietnam`s Coal-Fired Power P
BSE India: Nifty hovers near 6000; Ranbaxy, Bharti, BPCL up
description.content:
MUMBAI: Indian markets were witnessing a choppy session with positive bias due to lack of buying activity near resistance levels. Buying was seen in realty, metals and PSU stocks while auto, capital goods and pharma slipped lower.
At 1:20 pm; National Stock Exchange’s Nifty was at 6008.70, up 8.05 points or 0.13 per cent. The index touched a high of 6023.80 and low of 6001.85 in trade so far.
Bombay Stock Exchange’s Sensex was at 20089.73, up 29.41 points or 0.15 per cent. The index touched a high of 20151.25 and low of 20072.89 intraday.
“Momentum oscillators on hourly and daily chart continue to trade higher along with the price action. Nifty is trading within a steep upward trending channel that has a target of 6090, coinciding with the equality target of the previous weeks up move. Additionally as per Dow theory Nifty is in an uptrend, making a higher high and higher low on the daily chart, with reversal pegged below 5900.
Above 11,615 Bank Nifty will trigger a bullish breakout that has a target of 12,000,” said Edelweiss report.
BSE Midcap Index was up 0.37 per cent and BSE Smallcap Index gained 0.56 per cent.
Amongst the sectoral indices, BSE Realty Index was up 0.99 per cent, BSE Metal Index rose 0.71 per cent and BSE PSU Index gained 0.57 per cent. BSE Auto Index was down 0.14 per cent and BSE Capital Goods Index declined 0.09 per cent.
Ranbaxy Laboratories (2.65%), Bharti Airtel (2.57%), BPCL (1.76%), Sterlite Industries (1.75%) and Sesa Goa (1.48%) were amongst the top Nifty gainers.
Losers included Cipla (-1.94%), Hero Honda (-1.70%), Wipro (-1.53%), Reliance Infrastructure (-1.03%) and Maruti (-0.91%).
Market breadth was positive on the NSE with 1686 advances against 1160 declines.

description.hltext_display: Afghan official rebukes NATO for civilian deaths
description.content:
An Afghan provincial governor says NATO needs to exert greater caution in its operations following the death of five civilians during a battle with insurgents.
The office of the governor of Helmand province said in a statement Wednesday that the five civilians killed during the clash a day earlier included three women and two children. NATO says it is investigating the deaths, which Afghan officials say occurred during a Taliban raid on an Afghan national police checkpoint.
Afghan officials have repeatedly spoken out about civilian deaths, arguing that the international forces are not being careful enough to avoid such casualties as the war nears its tenth year. Insurgents also try to use the civilian death toll as a way of rallying support for their cause.

description.hltext_display: Today's Brokers heeft nu ook Belgische uitvalsbasis
description.content:
De beursmakelaar Today's Brokers, die bekend staat voor zijn scherpe tarieven, heeft nu ook een eigen kantoor in ons land. Hij opereert voortaan vanuit Zaventem.
Today's Brokers werd in 2005 opgericht om via het internet een goedkope uitvoering van beurstransacties aan te bieden. De makelaar is actief op 80 beurzen in 18 landen.
Het gaat om een Nederlands initiatief.
JVG

description.hltext_display: 映像流出 海上保安官を書類送検
China replaces top Foreign Ministry official
description.content:
China has replaced its top Foreign Ministry official amid a trend toward greater assertiveness in handling territorial disputes and participating in global organizations.
Vice Foreign Minister Zhang Zhijun took over recently as the ministry's Communist Party secretary, state media reports said Wednesday, meaning he outranks Foreign Minister Yang Jiechi. Yang was accused of being caught off guard when U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Clinton announced at a security conference in Vietnam this year that Washington considered the peaceful resolution of South China Sea disputes as part of the American national interest.
Zhang, 57, had served almost his entire career in the party's International Liaison Department, a type of shadow Foreign Ministry focussing on contacts with foreign political parties, until he became deputy to Yang last year.
That party background may mean he has more of a say in policymaking than his predecessor, as China increasingly abandons its former low-key approach to dealing with the outside world. The country's rising economic clout amid the global economic downturn that has battered traditional powers such as the United States has emboldened Chinese leaders to demand a bigger say in global affairs such as climate change and at international organizations, including the United Nations.
China's aggressive assertion of its territorial claims in the South China and East China seas have, meanwhile, sparked a backlash from other countries in the region, drawing them closer to Washington.
The powerful People's Liberation Army is believed to be leading the calls for a tougher line in such disputes, while other cabinet officials have emphasized quietly advancing China's interests in economic, media and cultural spheres.
China's most senior diplomat, State Counselor Dai Bingguo, is seen as balancing the different arguments, although the country's opaque political system ensures that such debates almost never make it into the public arena.
Little is known about Zhang's personal style, although his party background and relative lack of experience working abroad suggest he will closely reflect the tone set by the party leadership.
Zhang's appointment was announced on official websites, including that of the party's People's Daily newspaper, but no exact date was given.
He takes over from Wang Guangya, a courtly career diplomat who was ambassador to the U.N. from 2003-2008, during which China took advantage of the U.S. preoccupation with Iraq to quietly expand its diplomatic space.

event_or_fact.property: Washington considered the peaceful resolution of South China Sea disputes as part of the American national interest.
in policymaking than his predecessor, as China increasingly abandons its former low-key approach to dealing with the outside world

description.hltext_display: Xilinx Provides December Quarter Update
description.content:
SAN JOSE, Calif., Dec. 21, 2010 -- Xilinx, Inc. (Nasdaq: XLNX) today provided updated sales guidance for the December quarter of fiscal 2011.
December quarter sales are expected to be down approximately 7% to 9% sequentially. This is a revision from previous sales guidance of flat to down 4% sequentially. The decreased sales guidance is primarily related to weaker than anticipated sales to a few large communications customers, specifically in the wireless segment.
The Company expects sales growth to return to the communications segment in the March quarter based on current backlog and forecasts from its large customers.
Gross margin is expected to be approximately 65%, in line with previous guidance. Additional commentary pertaining to the March quarter will be provided when the company reports its third quarter financial results on January 19, 2011.

description.hltext_display: Cosmic Circuits Receives Frost & Sullivan Excellence Award
description.content:
Recognized for outstanding performance in the Analog/Mixed Signal Intellectual Property (IP) Market
Bangalore, India and Campbell, California, 22nd December 2010: Cosmic Circuits, a leading provider of differentiated Analog & Mixed Signal IP cores, today announced that it received the Frost & Sullivan Excellence Award. The award recognizes Cosmic Circuits' contributions to the Analog/Mixed Signal Intellectual Property (IP) Market.
Frost & Sullivan presented the "Frost & Sullivan Excellence Awards" at the Frost & Sullivan Excellence Awards Banquet held in New Delhi on Dec 16th. Cosmic Circuits was awarded in the category of Growth Leadership in the Global Analog/Mixed Signal Intellectual Property (IP) Market.
"We are pleased to have been awarded the Frost & Sullivan Excellence Award and consider this as recognition of our efforts in the Analog/Mixed Signal Intellectual Property Market. We have 250+ cores in our portfolio which includes Analog Front Ends, PLLs, Silicon Oscillators,, Audio, MIPI Interfaces, Data Converters and Power Management circuits in a variety of technologies, across the leading foundries in the world. We will continue to expand the portfolio in the coming years," said Ganapathy Subramaniam, CEO of Cosmic Circuits.
About Cosmic Circuits:
Cosmic Circuits is a leading provider of differentiated Analog and Mixed-Signal silicon IP cores. Cosmic offers a strong portfolio of 250+ cores in nanometer process nodes of leading foundries. By leveraging its silicon-proven cores spanning data-converters, wireless analog, audio, MIPI, power-management, Clocking, LVDS and Auxiliary functions, Cosmic provides single-stop access to customized IP solutions, bringing certainty in time-to-market with mixed-signal SOCs. A large team of expert designers continuously keep pace with technology nodes, standards and applications, bringing certainty to customer product continuity and differentiation. Adherence to Design-For-Manufacturing, Design-For-Test, a customer-centric approach to support that includes silicon-validation of Cosmic IP in customer SOC, backed by the experience of successfully catering to 50+ world-wide customers, brings certainty to volume production.
Contact Cosmic Circuits
Fill out this form for contacting a Cosmic Circuits representative.

description.hltext_display: PRECIOUS-Gold ticks up on euro zone debt worries
description.content:
SINGAPORE, Dec 22 (Reuters) - Gold inched up in thin trade on Wednesday, with sentiment still supported by worries of more ratings downgrades for indebted euro zone countries.
FUNDAMENTALS
* Spot gold rose $2.14 an ounce to $1,387.44 an ounce by 0033 GMT. Gold was well below a historical high of around $1,430 hit earlier this month.
* U.S. gold futures for February eased $1.1 an ounce to $1,387.7 an ounce.
* The International Monetary Fund announced on Tuesday the completion of the massive gold reserve sale it began a year ago, likely drawing to a close decades of bullion divestment from the public sector. [ID:nN21131060]
* The euro continued its slow descent on Wednesday as a steady drip of grim ratings news eroded confidence in the single currency, dragging it to record lows on the Swiss franc and Australian dollar.
* The world's largest gold-backed exchange-traded fund, SPDR Gold Trust , said its holdings eased to 1,298.029 tonnes by Dec. 21 from 1,298.940 tonnes on Dec. 17.
MARKET NEWS
* Japan's Nikkei average edged down on Wednesday as investors locked in profits ahead of the year-end holidays following a 1.5 percent rise the previous day, but sentiment towards Tokyo stocks remained bullish.
* U.S. crude futures extended gains to near $90 a barrel on Wednesday, getting support from industry data showing a surprise large drop in U.S. crude inventories.
(GMT) DATA/EVENTS
1200 U.S. Mortgage index Weekly
1330 U.S. GDP preliminary Final Q3
1330 U.S. GDP sales, prelim Q3
1330 U.S. Corporate profits Q3-Rev
1500 U.S. Exist. Hme pct sls Nov

description.hltext_display: Pepexâ¢ Unveils Development of First All-In-One Blood Glucose Meter
description.content:
Pepexâ„¢ Unveils Development of First All-In-One Blood Glucose Meter
Diabetes Sufferers Will Have Multi-Function, Handheld Meter and Insulin Delivery System
ST. LOUIS, Dec. 21, 2010 /PRNewswire/ -- Pepex Biomedical, Inc. has unveiled development of a next generation solution for insulin dependent diabetics which will combine regular glucose monitoring and insulin delivery for diabetes sufferers worldwide. The company is developing a complete product line of multi-function meters which allow simple testing of blood glucose levels and insulin delivery, appropriate to each glucose level measurement, all contained in a single, palm-sized unit. These meters provide anytime, anywhere tracking and treatment of diabetes.
Diabetes is a metabolic disorder in which the body's blood glucose level is higher than normal due to insufficient amounts of a hormone called insulin or improper utilization of insulin available. Glucose is used as a source of fuel in the body to provide energy for our daily activities. However, when the body cannot maintain normal blood glucose levels, it can have a serious impact on a person's health. Unattended diabetes can lead to heart disease, blindness, kidney disease, degeneration of nerve fibers and it is a major cause of premature illness and death.
According to the World Health Organization, approximately 285 million people, or 6.4% of the adult population, worldwide suffer from diabetes today. This figure is expected to increase to 438 million sufferers by 2030. In order to fight the disease, diabetics are required to test their blood glucose levels multiple times daily and those who are insulin dependent must administer insulin in an appropriate amount based upon the test results. Historically, this process requires a test meter, test strips, a lancet, syringes and a vial of insulin – an array of paraphernalia neither simple nor convenient to manage outside the home, while at work or during recreational activities.
"Pepex's new line of simple, all-in-one meters can truly change the lives of diabetes sufferers worldwide," comments Joseph Driver, Chairman of Pepex. "Our fully integrated device will test and track regular glucose levels and, in subsequent models, deliver the appropriate amount of insulin."
Pepex is a privately held medical device company specializing in the development, manufacturing, and marketing of disposable, miniaturized electrochemical biosensors. The company protects its market opportunities with 64 patents which encompass a broad spectrum of proprietary technology from sensor chemistry and architecture, to wireless communications for the sensors, to laser welding and high-speed manufacturing processes. Pepex biosensors are the heart of a pipeline of life altering products for medical diagnostics and intervention. The company is led by a team of business and scientific professionals experienced in the biomedical field and populated by a development staff with a successful track record of delivering next generation biomedical devices to market. For more information, please visit www.pepex.com.
If you'd like more information about this topic, or to schedule an interview with Joseph Driver, please call Andrea Skov at 408.888.3338 or e-mail Andrea at andrea.skov@pepex.com.
SOURCE Pepex Biomedical, Inc.

description.hltext_display: HS Girls Basketball Highlights: Strong start enough for Central
description.author: GateHouse Media, Inc
description.content:
@ 11:50 PM
The Central girls basketball team used a strong first half to knock off host Metamora, 46-35, in a Mid-Illini/Mid-State 6 Conference crossover Tuesday night.
Central, which received 14 points each from Jemia Carpenter and Ashley Hightower, led 11-6 after one quarter and 26-14 at the break.
“We got off to a bad start and couldn’t recover,” Metamora coach Steve Gorrell said. “We’re working on getting the first half going better.”
TREMONT 52, HEYWORTH 43: Taylor Muehlich scored 17 and Ali Marron 15 to guide the hosts to the Heart of Illinois victory.
The Turks trailed by one after the first quarter before going on a 14-1 push in the second quarter to lead 26-14 at the break.
BLOOMINGTON CENTRAL CATHOLIC 59, EUREKA 22: The hosts fell behind 14-3 after one quarter and could not recover in the Corn Belt contest.
Only five players scored for Eureka (6-3, 2-2), with Kalla Gold and Kayla Bryan each scoring a team-high five. Kelsey Young, Shelby Kuperfschmid and Michaela Balduci each had four points for the Hornets.

description.hltext_display: Arranca el sorteo de Navidad
description.author: EL PAÍS
description.content: A las 9.19 ha arrancado el tradicional sorteo de Navidad. Este año, la cita presenta como principal novedad un cambio de escenario. Desde hace 47 años los que los niños de San Ildefonso cantaban los números desde el Salón de Sorteos de Guzmán el Bueno, en Madrid, hoy lo hacen en el Palacio de Congresos de Madrid, lugar en el que el Sorteo Extraordinario de Navidad de Lotería Nacional repartirá 2.320.500.000¤ en premios.

description.hltext_display: 死亡と見なされた男 実刑判決
13 'fabless' chip firms to top $1B in sales
description.content:
SAN FRANCISCO--A record number of "fabless" semiconductor companies are expected to top $1 billion in sales in 2010, according to IC Insights Inc., though the market research firm defines the term to include companies that maintain fabs but get most of their finished wafers from foundries.
Thirteen chip companies that are fabless or mostly fabless are expected to top $1 billion in sales in 2010, up from 10 companies in 2009 and eight in 2008, according to IC Insights.
IC Insights counts any company as a fabless company if it receives the majority of its finished wafer supply from IC foundries. In this way it differs from the traditionally accepted definition of the term. Avago Technologies, for example, is ranked 10th on IC Insights' fabless company ranking, though the company maintains fabs in Colorado, Singapore and Malaysia.

description.hltext_display: 盛大发布员工发展报告：四成员工3个月即获涨薪
description.content:
12月22日下午消息，盛大发布2010年第三季度《员工发展报告》，透露1600多名员工在3个月内获得了职级的晋升和薪资的增长，比例高达40%。 � �据第三季度《员工发展报告》，在游戏式管理体系下的4000人中，有1600多名员工通过经验值取得了职级的晋升和薪资的增长，较之上一季度的1260名员工数量显著提升。与其他管理模式的程式化不同，盛大采用了“游戏式管理”，使得管理更� 有趣、公平。在推出以后，员工在工作上得到了更多的乐趣，� 此更努力地去工作。在这� �的推动下，每季度获得� 薪的员工数量逐步增� 到了四成之多。 在老员工得以发展的同时，盛大还在全球不断招募优秀人才。第三季度，来自微软、Google、毕马威等企业的5位行业顶尖人才� 盟盛大。旨在吸引优秀游戏运营人才的盛大游戏第十届产品/总监招� �会吸引了35名拥有丰富运营经验的候选人，最终签约6人。
盛大网络是互联网行业首个发布《员工发展报告》的企业，从2010年第二季度发布发布首份报告，今后，该报告将于每个季度定期对外发布。
